19588792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<List<T>> ToEnumerableOfEnumerable<T>(this T[,] array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int rowCount = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        int columnCount = array.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < rowCount; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var row = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            for (int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < columnCount; columnIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                row.Add(array[rowIndex, columnIndex]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return row;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static T[,] ToTwoDimensionalArray<T>(this List<List<T>> tuples)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = tuples.ToList();Di2015NewLine        T[,] array = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < list.Count; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var row = list[rowIndex];Di2015NewLine            if (array == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                array = new T[list.Count, row.Count];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < row.Count; columnIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                array[rowIndex, columnIndex] = row[columnIndex];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return array;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19588792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ListEqualityComparer<T> : IEqualityComparer<List<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(List<T> x, List<T> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.SequenceEqual(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(List<T> obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 19;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var o in obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash = hash * 31 + o.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19591118Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumExtentionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<Enum> ToList(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enum.GetValues(type)Di2015NewLine                    .OfType<Enum>()Di2015NewLine                    .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dictionary<int, string> ToDictionary(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.GetEnumValues().Cast<Enum>().ToDictionary(Convert.ToInt32, e => e.GetDescription());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<KeyValuePair<int, string>> ToListOfKeyValuePair(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enum.GetValues(type)Di2015NewLine                    .OfType<Enum>()Di2015NewLine                    .Select(e => new KeyValuePair<int, string>(Convert.ToInt32(e), e.GetDescription()))Di2015NewLine                    .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription(this Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.GetDescription(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription(this Enum value, string defaultValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var allFields = value.GetType().GetFields();Di2015NewLine        if (!allFields.Any())Di2015NewLine            return defaultValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var targetField = allFields.FirstOrDefault(fi => (fi.IsLiteral && (fi.GetValue(null).Equals(value))));Di2015NewLine        if (targetField == null)Di2015NewLine            return defaultValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var attrib = targetField.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(EnumValueDescriptionAttribute), false)Di2015NewLine            .OfType<EnumValueDescriptionAttribute>()Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        return attrib == null ? defaultValue : attrib.StringValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19595991Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetValue(string idPart, string test)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var escIdPart = Regex.Escape(idPart);Di2015NewLine    var pattern = string.Format("(?<=[\\\\{{\\\\s,]{0}\\\\s*=\\\\s*)\\\\d+", escIdPart);Di2015NewLine    var result = default(string);Di2015NewLine    var match = Regex.Match(test, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = match.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar pid = "{id=2, genderid=5, stateid=4}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar id = GetValue("id", pid); // returns "2"Di2015NewLinevar genderid = GetValue("genderid", pid); // returns "5"Di2015NewLinevar stateid = GetValue("stateid", pid); // returns "4"Di2015NewLine

19596126Di2015UniqueSeparator  private static byte[] chars = new byte[] { (byte)'0', (byte)'1', (byte)'2', (byte)'3', (byte)'4', (byte)'5', (byte)'6', (byte)'7', (byte)'8', (byte)'9' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Converts a long to a byte, in string formatDi2015NewLine  /// Di2015NewLine  /// This method essentially performs the same operation as ToString, with the output being a byte array,Di2015NewLine  /// rather than a stringDi2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="val">long integer input, with as many or fewer digits as the output buffer length</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="longBuffer">output buffer</param>Di2015NewLine  private void ConvertLong(long val, byte[] longBuffer)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     // The buffer must be large enough to hold the outputDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     long limit = (long)Math.Pow(10, longBuffer.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine     if (val >= limit * 10)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Value will not fit in output buffer");Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Note: Depending on your output expectation, you may do something different to initialize the data here.Di2015NewLine     // My expectation was that the string would be at the "front" in string format, e.g. the end of the array, with '0' in any extra spaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int bufferIndex = 1;Di2015NewLine     for (long longIndex = limit; longIndex > val; longIndex /= 10)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        longBuffer[longBuffer.Length - bufferIndex] = 0;Di2015NewLine        ++bufferIndex;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Finally, loop through the digits of the input, converting them from a static buffer of byte valuesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     while (val > 0)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        longBuffer[longBuffer.Length - bufferIndex] = chars[val % 10];Di2015NewLine        val /= 10;Di2015NewLine        ++bufferIndex;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

19597456Di2015UniqueSeparator(?>\\w+\\.)?\\w+\\((?>\\((?<DEPTH>)|\\)(?<-DEPTH>)|[^()]+)*\\)(?(DEPTH)(?!))|\\w+Di2015NewLine
19597456Di2015UniqueSeparator0 => usernameDi2015NewLine1 => TB_PEOPLE.fields(FirstName,LastName,TB_PHONE.fields(num_phone1, num_phone2))Di2015NewLine2 => passwordDi2015NewLine
19597456Di2015UniqueSeparator(?>\\w+\\.)? \\w+ \\(    # the opening parenthesis (with the function name)Di2015NewLine(?>                  # open an atomic groupDi2015NewLine    \\(  (?<DEPTH>)   # when an opening parenthesis is encountered,Di2015NewLine                     #  then increment the stack named DEPTHDi2015NewLine  |                  # ORDi2015NewLine    \\) (?<-DEPTH>)   # when a closing parenthesis is encountered,Di2015NewLine                     #  then decrement the stack named DEPTHDi2015NewLine  |                  # ORDi2015NewLine    [^()]+           # content that is not parenthesisDi2015NewLine)*                   # close the atomic group, repeat zero or more timesDi2015NewLine\\)                   # the closing parenthesisDi2015NewLine(?(DEPTH)(?!))       # conditional: if the stack named DEPTH is not emptyDi2015NewLine                     #  then fail (ie: parenthesis are not balanced)Di2015NewLine
19597456Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = "username,TB_PEOPLE.fields(FirstName,LastName,TB_PHONE.fields(num_phone1, num_phone2)),password";Di2015NewLinestring pattern = @"(?>\\w+\\.)?\\w+\\((?>\\((?<DEPTH>)|\\)(?<-DEPTH>)|[^()]+)*\\)(?(DEPTH)(?!))|\\w+";Di2015NewLineMatchCollection matches = Regex.Matches(input, pattern);Di2015NewLineforeach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(match.Groups[0].Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19597570Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<T> Merge<T>(Queue<T> Left, Queue<T> Right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> Result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    while (Left.Count > 0 && Right.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int cmp = Comparison((Left.Peek() as Entity), (Right.Peek() as Entity));Di2015NewLine        //If cmp is less than 0, left is less. If it is greater, left is greaterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cmp < 0)Di2015NewLine            Result.Add(Left.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            Result.Add(Right.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine

19598696Di2015UniqueSeparatorDbCommand
19598696Di2015UniqueSeparatorExecuteNonQueryAsync
19598696Di2015UniqueSeparator// System.Data.Common.DbCommandDi2015NewLinepublic virtual Task<int> ExecuteNonQueryAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (cancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ADP.CreatedTaskWithCancellation<int>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    CancellationTokenRegistration cancellationTokenRegistration = default(CancellationTokenRegistration);Di2015NewLine    if (cancellationToken.CanBeCanceled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cancellationTokenRegistration = cancellationToken.Register(new Action(this.CancelIgnoreFailure));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Task<int> result;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = Task.FromResult<int>(this.ExecuteNonQuery());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cancellationTokenRegistration.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        result = ADP.CreatedTaskWithException<int>(ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

i < Labels.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TextBoxControls[i].Location = new Point(maxLabelX + 10, TextBoxControls[i].Location.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19601945Di2015UniqueSeparator//This helper class to use some Win32 functions, must add using System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLinepublic class Win32 {Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern bool GetCaretPos(out POINT pos);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern bool SetCaretPos(int x, int y);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int SendMessage(IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLine    public struct POINT {Di2015NewLine        public int x, y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//This is the extension class for TextBox, it's just for convenienceDi2015NewLinepublic static class TextBoxExtension {Di2015NewLine    public static void BeginUpdate(this TextBox text) {Di2015NewLine        Win32.SendMessage(text.Handle, 0xb, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void EndUpdate(this TextBox text) {Di2015NewLine        Win32.SendMessage(text.Handle, 0xb, new IntPtr(1), IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static int GetCaretCharIndex(this TextBox text){Di2015NewLine        Win32.POINT p;Di2015NewLine        Win32.GetCaretPos(out p);Di2015NewLine        return text.GetCharIndexFromPosition(new Point(p.x, p.y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void SetCaretCharIndex(this TextBox text, int charIndex) {Di2015NewLine        Point p = text.GetPositionFromCharIndex(charIndex);Di2015NewLine        Win32.SetCaretPos(p.X, p.Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void ProcessRight(this TextBox text, bool shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine        if (shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine            int lastEndIndex = text.SelectionStart + text.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine            int caretCharIndex = text.GetCaretCharIndex();Di2015NewLine            if (caretCharIndex == lastEndIndex || (caretCharIndex == text.TextLength-1 && text.SelectionLength > 1)){Di2015NewLine                text.SelectionLength++;                    Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                text.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLine                text.SelectionStart++;                    Di2015NewLine                if (lastEndIndex < text.TextLength) text.SelectionLength--;Di2015NewLine                text.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine                text.Refresh();Di2015NewLine                if (text.SelectionStart < text.TextLength) text.SetCaretCharIndex(text.SelectionStart);Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            if (text.SelectionLength > 0) {Di2015NewLine                int s = text.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine                text.SelectionLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                text.SelectionStart += s;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (text.SelectionStart < text.TextLength) text.SelectionStart++; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void ProcessLeft(this TextBox text, bool shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine        if (shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine            if (text.GetCaretCharIndex() == text.SelectionStart || text.SelectionStart == text.TextLength) {Di2015NewLine                if (text.SelectionStart > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    text.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLine                    text.SelectionStart--;Di2015NewLine                    text.SelectionLength++;                                                                        Di2015NewLine                    text.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine                    text.Refresh();Di2015NewLine                    text.SetCaretCharIndex(text.SelectionStart);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                text.SelectionLength--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            if (text.SelectionStart > 0 && text.SelectionLength == 0) text.SelectionStart--;Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionLength = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void ProcessHome(this TextBox text, bool shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine        if (shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine            int i = text.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionStart = 0;Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionLength = i;Di2015NewLine            text.SetCaretCharIndex(0);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionLength = 0;Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionStart = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void ProcessEnd(this TextBox text, bool shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine        if (shiftPressed) {Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionLength = text.TextLength - text.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionLength = 0;Di2015NewLine            text.SelectionStart = text.TextLength;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void ProcessDelete(this TextBox text) {Di2015NewLine        if (text.SelectionLength == 0) text.SelectionLength = 1;Di2015NewLine        text.SelectedText = "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//your custom DataGridViewDi2015NewLinepublic class CustomDGV : DataGridView { Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler InnerTextBoxEnterKeyPress;         Di2015NewLine    protected override bool ProcessCmdKey(ref Message msg, Keys keyData) {Di2015NewLine        TextBox childControl = Controls.OfType<TextBox>().FirstOrDefault(c=>c.Focused);Di2015NewLine        if (childControl != null) {                Di2015NewLine            bool suppress = true;Di2015NewLine            switch (keyData) {Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Right:Di2015NewLine                    childControl.ProcessRight(false);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Shift | Keys.Right:Di2015NewLine                    childControl.ProcessRight(true);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Left:Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Control | Keys.X:Di2015NewLine                    childControl.Cut();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Focus();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    suppress = false;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            } 19608785Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Stream ProcessData(string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var sourceCollection = new BlockingCollection<string>())Di2015NewLine    using(var destinationCollection = new BlockingCollection<SomeClass>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Create a new background task to start reading in the fileDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() => ReadInFile(filePath, sourceCollection), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a new background task to process the read in lines as they come inDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() => TransformToClass(sourceCollection, destinationCollection), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Process the newly created objects as they are created on the same thread that we originally called the function withDi2015NewLine        return TrasformToStream(destinationCollection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void ReadInFile(string filePath, BlockingCollection<string> collection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(var line in File.ReadLines(filePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        collection.Add(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This lets the consumer know that we will not be adding any more items to the collection.Di2015NewLine    collection.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void TransformToClass(BlockingCollection<string> source, BlockingCollection<SomeClass> dest)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //GetConsumingEnumerable() will take items out of the collection and block the thread if there are no items available and CompleteAdding() has not been called yet.Di2015NewLine    Parallel.ForEeach(source.GetConsumingEnumerable(), Di2015NewLine                      (line) => dest.Add(SomeClass.ExpensiveTransform(line));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dest.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Stream TrasformToStream(BlockingCollection<SomeClass> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var record in source.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        record.Seralize(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return stream;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19616715Di2015UniqueSeparator    public object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.ContentType.StartsWith("application/json", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.InputStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(controllerContext.HttpContext.Request.InputStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var json = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(json))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dynamic result = new ExpandoObject();Di2015NewLine            var deserializedObject = new JavaScriptSerializer().DeserializeObject(json) as IDictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLine            if (deserializedObject != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in deserializedObject)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ((IDictionary<string, object>)result).Add(item.Key, item.Value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

+Di2015NewLine            "checkOut=" + request.CheckOut.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") + "&" +Di2015NewLine            "currency=" + request.Currency + "&" +Di2015NewLine            "clientNationality=" + request.ClientNationality + "&" +Di2015NewLine            "onRequest=" + request.OnRequest.ToString().ToLower();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public {Di2015NewLine                new ChildrenCollectionDescriptor(Di2015NewLine                    request => ((AvaliableHotelRequest)request).Rooms,Di2015NewLine                    (index, _) => "&rooms[" + index + "]")Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19620661Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToQuery(object root, IDictionary<Type, IQueryPartDescriptor> partDescriptors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queryBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    AddQueryPart(root, String.Empty, partDescriptors, queryBuilder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return queryBuilder.Insert(0, '?').ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void AddQueryPart(Di2015NewLine    object obj,Di2015NewLine    string prefixInQuery,Di2015NewLine    IDictionary<Type, IQueryPartDescriptor> partDescriptors,Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder queryBuilder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queryPartDescriptor = partDescriptors[obj.GetType()];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    queryBuilderDi2015NewLine        .Append(queryPartDescriptor.ObjectToQueryPart(prefixInQuery, obj));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var childrenListDescriptor in queryPartDescriptor.ChildrenListsDescriptors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var children = childrenListDescriptor.GetChildren(obj).ToList();Di2015NewLine        for (var childIndex = 0; childIndex < children.Count; childIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var childPrefix = childrenListDescriptor.BuildChildPrefix(childIndex, prefixInQuery);Di2015NewLine            AddQueryPart(children[childIndex], childPrefix, partDescriptors, queryBuilder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19621272Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ilPanel1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    // 3 arbitrary points Di2015NewLine    float[,] A = new float[3, 3] { Di2015NewLine        { 1.0f, 2.0f, 3.0f }, Di2015NewLine        { 2.0f, 2.0f, 4.0f }, Di2015NewLine        { 2.0f, -2.0f, 2.0f } Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // construct a new plotcube and plot the pointsDi2015NewLine    var scene = new ILScene {Di2015NewLine        new ILPlotCube(twoDMode: false) {Di2015NewLine            new ILPoints {Di2015NewLine                Positions = A,Di2015NewLine                Size = 4,Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // Plane equation: this is derived from the concrete example points. In your Di2015NewLine    // real world app you will have to adopt the weights a,b and c to your points. Di2015NewLine    Func<float, float, float> zEval = (x, y) => {Di2015NewLine        float a = 1, b = 0.5f, c = 1;Di2015NewLine        return a * x + b * y + c; Di2015NewLine    }; Di2015NewLine    // find bounding box of the plot contents Di2015NewLine    scene.Configure(); Di2015NewLine    var limits = scene.First<ILPlotCube>().Plots.Limits; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Construct the surface / plane to drawDi2015NewLine    // The 'plane' will be a surface constructed from a 2x2 mesh only. Di2015NewLine    // The x/y coordinates of the corners / grid points of the surface are taken from Di2015NewLine    // the limits of the plots /points. The corresponding Z coordinates are computed Di2015NewLine    // by the zEval function. So we give the ILSurface constructor not only Z coordinates Di2015NewLine    // as 2x2 matrix - but an Z,X,Y Array of size 2x2x3Di2015NewLine    ILArray<float> P = ILMath.zeros<float>(2, 2, 3);Di2015NewLine    Vector3 min = limits.Min, max = limits.Max; Di2015NewLine    P[":;:;1"] = new float[,] { { min.X, min.X }, { max.X, max.X } };Di2015NewLine    P[":;:;2"] = new float[,] { { max.Y, min.Y }, { max.Y, min.Y } };Di2015NewLine    P[":;:;0"] = new float[,] { Di2015NewLine        { zEval(min.X, max.Y) , zEval(min.X, min.Y) }, Di2015NewLine        { zEval(max.X, max.Y) , zEval(max.X, min.Y) }, Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // create the surface, make it semitransparent and modify the colormapDi2015NewLine    scene.First<ILPlotCube>().Add(new ILSurface(P) {Di2015NewLine        Alpha = 0.6f, Di2015NewLine        Colormap = Colormaps.PrismDi2015NewLine    }); Di2015NewLine    // give the scene to the panelDi2015NewLine    ilPanel1.Scene = scene;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19621272Di2015UniqueSeparatorplotCube.Limits.Set(min,max); Di2015NewLine

19623031Di2015UniqueSeparator/* This is a benchmarking template I use in LINQPad when I want to do aDi2015NewLine * quick performance test. Just give it a couple of actions to test andDi2015NewLine * it will give you a pretty good idea of how long they take comparedDi2015NewLine * to one another. It's not perfect: You can expect a 3% error marginDi2015NewLine * under ideal circumstances. But if you're not going to improveDi2015NewLine * performance by more than 3%, you probably don't care anyway.*/Di2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Enter setup code hereDi2015NewLine    var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    var chars = new char[1000];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        chars[i] = (char)random.Next('A', 'Z' + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var str = new string(chars);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var probabilities = Enumerable.Range(0, (int)Math.Pow(26, 4)).Select(i => random.NextDouble()).ToList();Di2015NewLine    var probabArray = new double[26,26,26,26];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < probabilities.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j1 = i % 26,Di2015NewLine            j2 = i / 26 % 26,Di2015NewLine            j3 = i / 26 / 26 % 26,Di2015NewLine            j4 = i / 26 / 26 / 26 % 26;Di2015NewLine        probabArray[j1, j2, j3, j4] = probabilities[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var probabDict = probabilities.Select((p, i) => new{Di2015NewLine        prob = p,Di2015NewLine        str = new string(new char[]{(char)(i%26 + 'A'), (char)(i / 26 % 26 + 'A'), (char)(i / 26 / 26 % 26 + 'A'), (char)(i / 26 / 26 / 26 % 26 + 'A')})Di2015NewLine    }).ToDictionary(e => e.str, e => e.prob);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var actions = new[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new TimedAction("first", () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < str.Length - 3; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prob = probabArray[str[i] - 'A', str[i + 1] - 'A', str[i + 2] - 'A', str[i + 3] - 'A'];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }),Di2015NewLine        new TimedAction("second", () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0; i < str.Length - 3; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prob = probabDict[str.Substring(i, 4)];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }),Di2015NewLine        // Enter additional tests hereDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    const int TimesToRun = 10000; // Tweak this as necessaryDi2015NewLine    TimeActions(TimesToRun, actions);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region timer helper methodsDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic void TimeActions(int iterations, params TimedAction[] actions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch s = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    int length = actions.Length;Di2015NewLine    var results = new ActionResult[actions.Length];Di2015NewLine    // Perform the actions in their initial order.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var action = actions[i];Di2015NewLine        var result = results[i] = new ActionResult{Message = action.Message};Di2015NewLine        // Do a dry run to get things ramped up/cachedDi2015NewLine        result.DryRun1 = s.Time(action.Action, 10);Di2015NewLine        result.FullRun1 = s.Time(action.Action, iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Perform the actions in reverse order.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var action = actions[i];Di2015NewLine        var result = results[i];Di2015NewLine        // Do a dry run to get things ramped up/cachedDi2015NewLine        result.DryRun2 = s.Time(action.Action, 10);Di2015NewLine        result.FullRun2 = s.Time(action.Action, iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    results.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ActionResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Message {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double DryRun1 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double DryRun2 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double FullRun1 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public double FullRun2 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TimedActionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TimedAction(string message, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message = message;Di2015NewLine        Action = action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Message {get;private set;}Di2015NewLine    public Action Action {get;private set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class StopwatchExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static double Time(this Stopwatch sw, Action action, int iterations)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine

(Sum.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("Sum: " + Sum.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("No values were successfully retrieved from the files!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("Press Enter to Quit");Di2015NewLine        System.Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ReadFile(Object fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (System.IO.StreamReader file1 = new System.IO.StreamReader(fileName.ToString()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int x = (lockObject)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!Sum.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Sum = x;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Sum = Sum + x;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Invalid ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Exception Reading File: " + fileName.ToString() + "\\r\\nException: " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19626105Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static partial class TestClass {Di2015NewLine    public static String itoa(int n, int radix) {Di2015NewLine        if(0==n)Di2015NewLine            return "0";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var index=10;Di2015NewLine        var buffer=new char[1+index];Di2015NewLine        var xlat="0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int r=Math.Abs(n), q; r>0; r=q) {Di2015NewLine            q=Math.DivRem(r, radix, out r);Di2015NewLine            buffer[index-=1]=xlat[r];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(n<0) {Di2015NewLine            buffer[index-=1]='-';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new String(buffer, index, buffer.Length-index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TestMethod() {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}", itoa(-0x12345678, 16));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19626115Di2015UniqueSeparatorCombinations(int[][] list1, int[] list2)
19626115Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace testDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static class IntArrayDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static int[] FromValues(params int[] values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return values;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int[] Sequence(int from, int length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (from < 0 || length < 1)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Range(from, length).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int[][] Combinations(int[] list1, int[] list2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Combinations(list1.Select(i => new int[] { i }).ToArray(), list2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int[][] Combinations(int[][] list1, int[] list2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<List<int>> result = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < list1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < list2.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(((int[]) list1.GetValue(i)).Concat(new int[] { list2[j] }).ToList());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result.Select(i => i.ToArray()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    abstract class BoundedArray<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public BoundedArray()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_data = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Array ValueDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return m_data; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T this[params int[] index]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index.Length != m_data.Rank)Di2015NewLine                    throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return (T) m_data.GetValue(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index.Length != m_data.Rank)Di2015NewLine                    throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_data.SetValue(value, index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void SetAttributes(params int[][] values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Make sure all of the values are pairsDi2015NewLine            if (values.Where(i => i.Length != 2).ToArray().Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Input arrays must be of length 2.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[] lowerBounds = values.Select(i => i[0]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            int[] lengths = values.Select(i => i[1] - i[0] + 1).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_data = Array.CreateInstance(typeof(T), lengths, lowerBounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[][] indices = (lowerBounds.Length != 1) ?Di2015NewLine                IntArray.Combinations(IntArray.Sequence(lowerBounds[0], lengths[0]), IntArray.Sequence(lowerBounds[1], lengths[1]))Di2015NewLine                : IntArray.Sequence(lowerBounds[0], lengths[0]).Select(i => new int[] { i }).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 2; i < lowerBounds.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                indices = IntArray.Combinations(indices, IntArray.Sequence(lowerBounds[i], lengths[i]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < indices.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                m_data.SetValue(Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T)), indices[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Array m_data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19626115Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace testDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // *** Examples of what you can do with BoundedArray ***Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Multi-dimensional, bounded base arrayDi2015NewLine        class BaseArray : BoundedArray<int>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public BaseArray()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SetAttributes(IntArray.FromValues(2, 3), IntArray.FromValues(2, 4));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // One-dimensional, bounded subclass arrayDi2015NewLine        class SubArray : BoundedArray<BaseArray>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public SubArray()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SetAttributes(IntArray.FromValues(4, 6));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Initializations used for testing purposesDi2015NewLine            BaseArray baseArray = new BaseArray();Di2015NewLine            SubArray subArray = new SubArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Example of assignmentDi2015NewLine            baseArray[3, 4] = 3;Di2015NewLine            subArray[4][2, 3] = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            subArray[4][2] = 3; // Weakness: compiles, but causes IndexOutOfRangeExceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19626130Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void BeginTesting() // start testingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Step 1 : Print number 1 to 100Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= 100; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var results = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            // Step 2 :- Divisable by 9 print FizzDi2015NewLine            if (i % 9 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results = "Fizz";Di2015NewLine                TotalFizz++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 3 :- Divisable by 13 print BuzzDi2015NewLine            if (i % 13 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results = "Buzz";Di2015NewLine                TotalBuzz++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 4 :- Divisable by 9 and 13 print FizzBuzzDi2015NewLine            if (i % 9 == 0 && i % 13 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results = "FizzBuzz";Di2015NewLine                TotalFizzBuzz++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(results))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Step 5 :- Print the number as it is if not divisable by 9 or 13Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(i.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(results);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19626203Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SimpleMonitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int m_LockState = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int iterations = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (!TryEnter())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (iterations < 10) Thread.SpinWait(4 << iterations);Di2015NewLine            else if (iterations % 20 == 0) Thread.Sleep(1);Di2015NewLine            else if (iterations % 5 == 0) Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine            else Thread.Yield();Di2015NewLine            iterations++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Exit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!TryExit())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new SynchronizationLockException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryEnter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref m_LockState, 1, 0) == 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryExit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref m_LockState, 0, 1) == 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19638651Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GenerateValidationModel<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var name = typeof(T).Name.Replace("Model", "ViewModel");Di2015NewLine    name = Char.ToLowerInvariant(name[0]) + name.Substring(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var validationModel = "var " + name + " = {\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var prop in typeof(T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object[] attrs = prop.GetCustomAttributes(true);Di2015NewLine        if (attrs == null || attrs.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string conds = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Attribute attr in attrs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (attr is MinLengthAttribute)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                conds += ", minLength: " + (attr as MinLengthAttribute).Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (attr is RequiredAttribute)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                conds += ", required: true";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // ...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (conds.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            validationModel += String.Format("\\t{0}: ko.observable().extend({{ {1} }}),\\n", prop.Name, conds.Trim(',', ' '));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return validationModel + "};";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19638777Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ObservableCollection<MyClass> first = new ObservableCollection<MyClass> { "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "k" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ISet<IMyInterface> second = new HashSet<IMyInterface>(new MyClass2[] { 2, 3, 5 }, new MyEqualityComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    first.CrossRemove(second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", first.Select(x => x.MyProperty)));Di2015NewLine    // 1, 4, 6, kDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IMyInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MyEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<IMyInterface>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(IMyInterface a, IMyInterface b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return a.MyProperty == b.MyProperty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(IMyInterface obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return obj.MyProperty.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void CrossRemove<TFirst, TSecond>(this ObservableCollection<TFirst> collection, ISet<TSecond> set) where TFirst : TSecondDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in collection.Where(item => set.Contains(item)).ToList())Di2015NewLine            collection.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MyClass : IMyInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator MyClass(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyClass { MyProperty = s };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MyClass2 : IMyInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator MyClass2(int i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyClass2 { MyProperty = i.ToString() };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19638777Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<object>
19638777Di2015UniqueSeparator(TypeA a, TypeB b) => a.PropA == b.PropBDi2015NewLine
19638777Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyOtherEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<object>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private object GetProperty(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj is TypeA)Di2015NewLine            return ((TypeA)obj).PropA;Di2015NewLine        else if (obj is TypeB)Di2015NewLine            return ((TypeB)obj).PropB;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(object a, object b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetProperty(a).Equals(GetProperty(b));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetProperty(obj).GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19640085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19640085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>Di2015NewLine    Compose<TFirstParam, TIntermediate, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TIntermediate>> first,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TIntermediate, TResult>> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TFirstParam), "param");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newFirst = new ReplaceVisitor(first.Parameters.First(), param)Di2015NewLine        .Visit(first.Body);Di2015NewLine    var newSecond = new ReplaceVisitor(second.Parameters.First(), newFirst)Di2015NewLine        .Visit(second.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>(newSecond, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19641670Di2015UniqueSeparator  private static String Interval(DateTime start, DateTime end)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (end <= start)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid interval");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int days = 0;Di2015NewLine        int months = 0;Di2015NewLine        int years = 0;Di2015NewLine        DateTime temp = start;Di2015NewLine        while (start.AddYears(years) <= end)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++years;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        --years;Di2015NewLine        temp = temp.AddYears(years);Di2015NewLine        while (temp.AddMonths(months) <= end)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++months;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        --months;Di2015NewLine        temp = temp.AddMonths(months);Di2015NewLine        while (temp.AddDays(days) <= end)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++days;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        --days;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        if (years > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.AppendFormat("{0}Y ", years);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (months > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.AppendFormat("{0}M ", months);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (days > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.AppendFormat("{0}D", days);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19642397Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> IntersectAll<T>(params IEnumerable<T>[] sequences)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!sequences.Any())Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var set = new HashSet<T>(sequences.First());Di2015NewLine    foreach (var sequence in sequences.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        set.IntersectWith(sequence);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return set;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19646950Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class JsonExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<JToken> FindTokens(this JToken containerToken, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<JToken> matches = new List<JToken>();Di2015NewLine        FindTokens(containerToken, name, matches);Di2015NewLine        return matches;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void FindTokens(JToken containerToken, string name, List<JToken> matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (containerToken.Type == JTokenType.Object)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (JProperty child in containerToken.Children<JProperty>())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (child.Name == name)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matches.Add(child.Value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                FindTokens(child.Value, name, matches);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (containerToken.Type == JTokenType.Array)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (JToken child in containerToken.Children())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FindTokens(child, name, matches);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19647721Di2015UniqueSeparator[System.Web.Services.WebMethod(), System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethod()]Di2015NewLinepublic static List<string> GetAccountNumbers(string prefixText, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string CurUser = HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name.ToString();Di2015NewLine    string CurUserRemoveDomain = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    int i = CurUser.IndexOf("\\\\");Di2015NewLine    if (i != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CurUserRemoveDomain = CurUser.ToLower().Replace(Resources.AppSettings.ActiveDirectoryDomain.ToString().ToLower() + "\\\\", "");Di2015NewLine        CurUser = CurUserRemoveDomain;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn.ConnectionString = ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["CustDBConn"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine        using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand("SP_PCard_Get_AutoCompleteAccountNumbers", conn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@RecCount", count);Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@SearchString", prefixText);Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@UserName", CurUser);Di2015NewLine            cmd.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLine            conn.Open();Di2015NewLine            List<string> AccountNumbers = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            using (SqlDataReader sdr = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (sdr.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AccountNumbers.Add(sdr["ACTNUMST"].ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine            return AccountNumbers;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19648380Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DownloadCompletedCallback(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         ... download cancelled...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (e.Error != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         ... download failed...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ActiveDownloadJob adJob = e.UserState as ActiveDownloadJob;Di2015NewLine    ProgressBar pb = (adJob != null) ? adJob.ProgressBar : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lock (_downloadQueue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_downloadQueue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (pb != null) pb.Tag = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DownloadData dd = _downloadQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            StartDownloadWithProgressBar(dd, pb);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19648390Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TreeItem<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Item { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TreeItem<T>> Children { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19648390Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class GenericHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates tree of items from item listDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Type of item in collection</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="K">Type of parent_id</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="collection">Collection of items</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="id_selector">Function extracting item's id</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parent_id_selector">Function extracting item's parent_id</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="root_id">Root element id</param>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Tree of items</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TreeItem<T>> GenerateTree<T, K>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> collection,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, K> id_selector,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, K> parent_id_selector,Di2015NewLine        K root_id = default(K))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var c in collection.Where(c => parent_id_selector(c).Equals(root_id)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new TreeItem<T>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Item = c,Di2015NewLine                Children = collection.GenerateTree(id_selector, parent_id_selector, id_selector(c))Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

= "application/ms-excel";           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           using (HtmlTextWriter htw = new #c1d8f1");Di2015NewLine                   table.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               //  add the footer row to the tableDi2015NewLine               if        {Di2015NewLine            Control current = control.Controls[i];Di2015NewLine            if (current is LinkButton)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine ImageButton).AlternateText));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (current is HyperLink)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine (current is DropDownList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                control.Controls.Remove(current);Di2015NewLine                control.Controls.AddAt(i, new LiteralControl((current as DropDownList).SelectedItem.Text));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (current is CheckBox)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine 19652735Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void WriteTree(ProtoReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (reader.ReadFieldHeader() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(reader.FieldNumber);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(reader.WireType);Di2015NewLine        switch (reader.WireType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case WireType.Variant:Di2015NewLine                // warning: this appear to be wrong if the Di2015NewLine                // value was written signed ("zigzag") - toDi2015NewLine                // read zigzag, add: pr.Hint(WireType.SignedVariant);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadInt64());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case WireType.String:Di2015NewLine                // note: "string" here just means "some bytes"; couldDi2015NewLine                // be UTF-8, could be a BLOB, could be a "packed array",Di2015NewLine                // or could be sub-object(s); showing UTF-8 for simplicityDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadString());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case WireType.Fixed32:Di2015NewLine                // could be an integer, but probably floating pointDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadSingle());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case WireType.Fixed64:Di2015NewLine                // could be an integer, but probably floating pointDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadDouble());Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case WireType.StartGroup:Di2015NewLine                // one of 2 sub-object formatsDi2015NewLine                var tok = ProtoReader.StartSubItem(reader);Di2015NewLine                WriteTree(reader);Di2015NewLine                ProtoReader.EndSubItem(tok, reader);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                reader.SkipField();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19653059Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic DateTime RoundToNearestInterval(DateTime dt, TimeSpan d)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int f=0;Di2015NewLine   double m = (double)(dt.Ticks % d.Ticks) / d.Ticks;Di2015NewLine   if (m >= 0.5)Di2015NewLine       f=1;            Di2015NewLine   return new DateTime(((dt.Ticks/ d.Ticks)+f) * d.Ticks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19653059Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar result = from kvp in dataDi2015NewLine             let key = RoundToNearestInterval(kvp.Key, TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5))Di2015NewLine             group kvp by key into gDi2015NewLine             select new { g.Key, Value = g.Average(x => x.Value) };Di2015NewLine

19657560Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IQueryable<T> WhereColumnContains<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, Expression<Func<T, string>> selector, string search)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(search))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    search = search.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var filterStartsWith = search.EndsWith("*");Di2015NewLine    var filterEndsWith = search.StartsWith("*");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (filterEndsWith) search = search.Substring(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (filterStartsWith)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        search = search.Substring(0, search.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (filterEndsWith)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "parameter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Call(Expression.Invoke(selector, parameter), typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] { typeof(string) }), Expression.Constant(search)),Di2015NewLine                parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "parameter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Call(Expression.Invoke(selector, parameter), typeof(string).GetMethod("StartsWith", new[] { typeof(string) }), Expression.Constant(search)),Di2015NewLine                parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (filterEndsWith)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "parameter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Call(Expression.Invoke(selector, parameter), typeof(string).GetMethod("EndsWith", new[] { typeof(string) }), Expression.Constant(search)),Di2015NewLine                parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "parameter");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                Expression.Equal(Expression.Invoke(selector, parameter), Expression.Constant(search)),Di2015NewLine                parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.Where(expression);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19658012Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string selectCell(int Column, int Row)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (CurrentTable.Rows.Count <= Row)   // zero based indicesDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid number of rows in selectCell", "Row");Di2015NewLine    if (CurrentTable.Columns.Count <= Column)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid number of columns in selectCell", "Column");Di2015NewLine    var row = CurrentTable.Rows[Row];Di2015NewLine    // remove following  check if you want to return "" instead of nullDi2015NewLine    // but then you won't know if it was an empty or an undefined valueDi2015NewLine    if (row.IsNull(Column))  Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    return row[Column].ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19659924Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (Request.Cookies["latestVisit"] == null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpCookie myCookie = new HttpCookie("latestVisit");Di2015NewLine    myCookie.Expires = DateTime.Now.AddYears(1);Di2015NewLine    myCookie.Values[title] = System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(URL);Di2015NewLine    Response.Cookies.Add(myCookie);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var myCookie = Request.Cookies["latestVisit"];Di2015NewLine    var cookieCollection = myCookie.Values;Di2015NewLine    string[] CookieTitles = cookieCollection.AllKeys;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //mj-y: If the url is reapeated, move it to end(means make it newer by removing it and adding it again)Di2015NewLine    string cookieURL = "";Di2015NewLine    foreach (string cookTit in CookieTitles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cookieURL = System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(Request.Cookies["latestVisit"].Values[cookTit]);Di2015NewLine        if (cookieURL == URL)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cookieCollection.Remove(cookTit);Di2015NewLine            cookieCollection.Set(title, System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(URL));Di2015NewLine            Response.SetCookie(myCookie);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //mj-y: If it was not repeated ...Di2015NewLine    cookieCollection.Set(title, System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(URL));Di2015NewLine    if (cookieCollection.Count > 15) // store just 15 item         Di2015NewLine        cookieCollection.Remove(CookieTitles[0]);Di2015NewLine    Response.SetCookie(myCookie);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19663798Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar alarms = eventsDi2015NewLine    .GroupBy(e => e.Id)Di2015NewLine    .SelectMany(grp =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Determine light color based on delay between eventsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // go black if event arrives that is not staleDi2015NewLine        var black = grpDi2015NewLine            .Where(ev => (Date.Now - ev.TimeStamp) < TimeSpan.FromSeconds(2))Di2015NewLine            .Select(ev => "black");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // go yellow if no events after 1 secondDi2015NewLine        var yellow = blackDi2015NewLine            .Select(b => Observable.Timer(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1)))Di2015NewLine            .SwitchLatest()Di2015NewLine            .Select(t => "yellow");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // go red if no events after 2 secondsDi2015NewLine        var red = blackDi2015NewLine            .Select(b => Observable.Timer(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(2)))Di2015NewLine            .SwitchLatest()Di2015NewLine            .Select(t => "red");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ObservableDi2015NewLine            .Merge(black, yellow, red)Di2015NewLine            .Select(color => new { Id = grp.Key, Color = color });Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine

19666784Di2015UniqueSeparatorInt32
19666784Di2015UniqueSeparatorString
19666784Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class StringOrInt32Serializer : BsonBaseSerializerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override object Deserialize(BsonReader bsonReader, Type nominalType,Di2015NewLine        Type actualType, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bsonType = bsonReader.CurrentBsonType;Di2015NewLine        switch (bsonType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case BsonType.Null:Di2015NewLine                bsonReader.ReadNull();Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            case BsonType.String:Di2015NewLine                return bsonReader.ReadString();Di2015NewLine            case BsonType.Int32:Di2015NewLine                return bsonReader.ReadInt32().ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                var message = string.Format("Cannot deserialize BsonString or BsonInt32 from BsonType {0}.", bsonType);Di2015NewLine                throw new BsonSerializationException(message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Serialize(BsonWriter bsonWriter, Type nominalType,Di2015NewLine        object value, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bsonWriter.WriteString(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bsonWriter.WriteNull();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19668259Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SeperateClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static int numberOfRequest = 500;Di2015NewLine    public async static void LoadUrlsAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var startTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsAsync Start - {0}", startTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tasks = new List<Task<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numberOfRequest; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var request = WebRequest.Create(@"http://www.google.com/images/srpr/logo11w.png") as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var task = LoadUrlAsync(request);Di2015NewLine            tasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = await Task.WhenAll(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var stopTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        var duration = (stopTime - startTime);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsAsync Complete - {0}", stopTime);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsAsync Duration - {0}ms", duration);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    async static Task<string> LoadUrlAsync(WebRequest request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string value = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        using (var response = await request.GetResponseAsync())Di2015NewLine        using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} - Bytes: {1}", request.RequestUri, value.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SeperateClassSyncDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static int numberOfRequest = 500;Di2015NewLine    public async static void LoadUrlsSync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var startTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsSync Start - {0}", startTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tasks = new List<Task<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numberOfRequest; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var request = WebRequest.Create(@"http://www.google.com/images/srpr/logo11w.png") as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var task = LoadUrlSync(request);Di2015NewLine            tasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = await Task.WhenAll(tasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var stopTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        var duration = (stopTime - startTime);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsSync Complete - {0}", stopTime);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LoadUrlsSync Duration - {0}ms", duration);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    async static Task<string> LoadUrlSync(WebRequest request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string value = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        using (var response = request.GetResponse())//Still async FW, just changed to Sync call hereDi2015NewLine        using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} - Bytes: {1}", request.RequestUri, value.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SeperateClass.LoadUrlsAsync();Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();//record result and run againDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SeperateClassSync.LoadUrlsSync();Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19668603Di2015UniqueSeparator    //This code block is designed to schedule a timer for 5:35pm Eastern Time, regardless of whether is is Daylight Savings (EDT, UTC-4) or not (EST, UTC-5). Di2015NewLine    //  When understanding this code it is important to remember that a DateTime in UTC time represents an ABSOLUTE point in time. Any UTC time can only occur once. Di2015NewLine    //  A date time measured in local time (here we force Eastern Standard) is NOT ABSOLUTE. The same local time can occur twice (2am Nov 3nd 2013 for example)Di2015NewLine    //Gets Eastern Timezone to be used in conversionsDi2015NewLine    TimeZoneInfo easternTimeZoneInfo = TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById("Eastern Standard Time");Di2015NewLine    //Grabs the current time (UTC) Di2015NewLine    DateTime utcNowDateTime = DateTime.Now.ToUniversalTime();Di2015NewLine    //Gets current time in Eastern Time (could be UTC-4 or -5 depending on time of year)Di2015NewLine    DateTime easternNowDateTime = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime(utcNowDateTime, easternTimeZoneInfo);Di2015NewLine    //Gets todays dateDi2015NewLine    DateTime easternNowDate = easternNowDateTime.Date;Di2015NewLine    //Gets 5:35pm today or tomorrow depending on whether we are past 5:35pm or not. Di2015NewLine    //  Even though there are actually 18 hours from midnight to 5:35pm on Nov 2 2014 and 16 hours from midnight to 5:35pm on March 9 2014, Di2015NewLine    //  this will still end up at 5:35pm on those days because DateTime DOESNOT take into account the movement of the clocks (foreward or backward) when calling Di2015NewLine    //  .AddHours(), etcDi2015NewLine    DateTime easternExpiryDateTime = easternNowDate.AddHours(17).AddMinutes(35).AddDays(easternNowDateTime.Hour >= 18 || (easternNowDateTime.Hour == 17 && easternNowDateTime.Minute >= 35) ? 1 : 0);Di2015NewLine    //Convert the Easter Time date time to UTC. When subtracting this time from another UTC DateTime you will get the correct TimeSpan for use with a timerDi2015NewLine    //  (even on 23 such as March 10th and 25 hour days such as November 3rd 2013)Di2015NewLine    DateTime utcExpiryDateTime = easternExpiryDateTime.ToUniversalTime();Di2015NewLine    //Set the timer to trigger at the desired point in the future.Di2015NewLine    Timer timer = new Timer(Di2015NewLine       ...,Di2015NewLine       null,Di2015NewLine       utcExpiryDateTime - utcNowDateTime ,Di2015NewLine       ...);Di2015NewLine

19672238Di2015UniqueSeparatorRfc2898DeriveBytes
19672238Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class rfc2898testDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Generate a key k1 with password pwd1 and salt salt1. Di2015NewLine    // Generate a key k2 with password pwd1 and salt salt1. Di2015NewLine    // Encrypt data1 with key k1 using symmetric encryption, creating edata1. Di2015NewLine    // Decrypt edata1 with key k2 using symmetric decryption, creating data2. Di2015NewLine    // data2 should equal data1. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string usageText = "Usage: RFC2898 <password>\\nYou must specify the password for encryption.\\n";Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] passwordargs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //If no file name is specified, write usage text. Di2015NewLine        if (passwordargs.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(usageText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string pwd1 = passwordargs[0];Di2015NewLine            // Create a byte array to hold the random value.  Di2015NewLine            byte[] salt1 = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine            using (RNGCryptoServiceProvider rngCsp = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Fill the array with a random value.Di2015NewLine                rngCsp.GetBytes(salt1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //data1 can be a string or contents of a file. Di2015NewLine            string data1 = "Some test data";Di2015NewLine            //The default iteration count is 1000 so the two methods use the same iteration count.Di2015NewLine            int myIterations = 1000;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Rfc2898DeriveBytes k1 = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(pwd1, salt1, myIterations);Di2015NewLine                Rfc2898DeriveBytes k2 = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(pwd1, salt1);Di2015NewLine                // Encrypt the data.Di2015NewLine                TripleDES encAlg = TripleDES.Create();Di2015NewLine                encAlg.Key = k1.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream encryptionStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                CryptoStream encrypt = new CryptoStream(encryptionStream, encAlg.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine                byte[] utfD1 = new System.Text.UTF8Encoding(false).GetBytes(data1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                encrypt.Write(utfD1, 0, utfD1.Length);Di2015NewLine                encrypt.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                encrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                byte[] edata1 = encryptionStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                k1.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Try to decrypt, thus showing it can be round-tripped.Di2015NewLine                TripleDES decAlg = TripleDES.Create();Di2015NewLine                decAlg.Key = k2.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine                decAlg.IV = encAlg.IV;Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream decryptionStreamBacking = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                CryptoStream decrypt = new CryptoStream(decryptionStreamBacking, decAlg.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine                decrypt.Write(edata1, 0, edata1.Length);Di2015NewLine                decrypt.Flush();Di2015NewLine                decrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                k2.Reset();Di2015NewLine                string data2 = new UTF8Encoding(false).GetString(decryptionStreamBacking.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!data1.Equals(data2))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Error: The two values are not equal.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("The two values are equal.");Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("k1 iterations: {0}", k1.IterationCount);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("k2 iterations: {0}", k2.IterationCount);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Error: ", e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
