19672841Di2015UniqueSeparatorValidationAttribute
19672841Di2015UniqueSeparatorComparisonType
19672841Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum ComparisonTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LessThan,Di2015NewLine    LessThanOrEqual,Di2015NewLine    Equal,Di2015NewLine    GreaterThanOrEqual,Di2015NewLine    GreaterThan,Di2015NewLine    NotEqualDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class ComparisonAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string PropertyToCompare { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    ComparisonType Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ComparisonAttribute(string propertyToCompare, ComparisonType type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyToCompare = propertyToCompare;Di2015NewLine        Type = type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (validationContext.ObjectInstance == null || value == null)Di2015NewLine            return new ValidationResult("Cannot compare null values");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo property = validationContext.ObjectType.GetProperty(PropertyToCompare);Di2015NewLine        object propertyValue = property.GetValue(validationContext.ObjectInstance, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string errorMessage = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value is IComparable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int compVal = ((IComparable)value).CompareTo(propertyValue);Di2015NewLine            switch (Type)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.LessThan:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal < 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} is not less than {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.LessThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal <= 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} is not less than or equal to {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.Equal:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal == 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} is not equal to {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.GreaterThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal >= 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} is not greater than or equal to {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal > 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} is not greater than {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ComparisonType.NotEqual:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = compVal != 0 ? "" : string.Format("{0} cannot be equal to {1}", validationContext.DisplayName, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    errorMessage = "";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(errorMessage))Di2015NewLine            return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ValidationResult(errorMessage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19687048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ButtonX : Button {Di2015NewLine    GraphicsPath border = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine    int radius = 3;Di2015NewLine    float borderWidth;Di2015NewLine    Color borderColor = Color.Orange;Di2015NewLine    bool _checked;Di2015NewLine    public float BorderWidth {Di2015NewLine        get { return borderWidth; }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            borderWidth = value;Di2015NewLine            Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Color BorderColor {Di2015NewLine        get { return borderColor; }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            borderColor = value;Di2015NewLine            Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public ButtonX() {Di2015NewLine        BorderWidth = 4;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Checked {Di2015NewLine        get { return _checked; }Di2015NewLine        set { Di2015NewLine            _checked = value;Di2015NewLine            Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs pevent) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(pevent);Di2015NewLine        if (Checked) {Di2015NewLine            pevent.Graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine            for (float f = BorderWidth; f >= 0.01f; f -= 1f)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Pen pen = new Pen(Color.FromArgb((int)(100 - 100 * f * f / (BorderWidth * BorderWidth)), borderColor), f))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pen.LineJoin = LineJoin.Round;Di2015NewLine                    pen.Alignment = PenAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLine                    pevent.Graphics.DrawPath(pen, border);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateBorder() {Di2015NewLine        border = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine        RectangleF rect = new RectangleF{Width = radius * 2, Height = radius * 2, X = BorderWidth/2, Y = BorderWidth/2};Di2015NewLine        border.AddArc(rect, 180, 90);Di2015NewLine        rect.X = ClientSize.Width - BorderWidth/2 - radius * 2 - 0.5f;            Di2015NewLine        border.AddArc(rect, 270, 90);Di2015NewLine        rect.Y = ClientSize.Height - BorderWidth/2 - radius * 2 - 0.5f;Di2015NewLine        border.AddArc(rect, 0, 90);Di2015NewLine        rect.X = BorderWidth / 2;Di2015NewLine        border.AddArc(rect, 90, 90);Di2015NewLine        border.CloseAllFigures();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnSizeChanged(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnSizeChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        UpdateBorder();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19689415Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Represents the entry point of our application.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="args">Possibly spcified command line arguments.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string batchCommands = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    string exeFileName = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().CodeBase.Replace("file:///",string.Empty).Replace("/","\\\\");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    batchCommands += "@ECHO OFF\\n";                         // Do not show any outputDi2015NewLine    batchCommands += "ping 127.0.0.1 > nul\\n";              // Wait approximately 4 seconds (so that the process is already terminated)Di2015NewLine    batchCommands += "echo j | del /F ";                    // Delete the executeableDi2015NewLine    batchCommands += exeFileName + "\\n";Di2015NewLine    batchCommands += "echo j | del deleteMyProgram.bat";    // Delete this bat fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    File.WriteAllText("deleteMyProgram.bat", batchCommands);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Process.Start("deleteMyProgram.bat");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19689517Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Take an extended key and walk through an object to update it.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="o">The object to update</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="key">The key in the form of "NestedThing.List[2].key"</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value">The value to update to</param>Di2015NewLineprivate static void UpdateModel(object o, string key, object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO:Di2015NewLine    // Make the code more efficient.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var target = o;Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo pi = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Split the key into bits.Di2015NewLine    var steps = key.Split('.').ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Don't walk all the way to the endDi2015NewLine    // Save that for the last step.Di2015NewLine    var lastStep = steps[steps.Count-1];Di2015NewLine    steps.RemoveAt(steps.Count-1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Step through the bits.Di2015NewLine    foreach (var bit in steps)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var step = bit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string index = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is this an indexed property?Di2015NewLine        if (step.EndsWith("]"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Extract out the value of the indexDi2015NewLine            var end = step.IndexOf("[", System.StringComparison.Ordinal);Di2015NewLine            index = step.Substring(end+1, step.Length - end - 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and trim 'step' back down to exclude it.  (List[5] becomes List)Di2015NewLine            step = step.Substring(0, end);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the new target.Di2015NewLine        pi = target.GetType().GetProperty(step);Di2015NewLine        target = pi.GetValue(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the target had an index, find it now.Di2015NewLine        if (index != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var idx = Convert.ToInt16(index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The most generic way to handle it.Di2015NewLine            var list = (IEnumerable) target;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var e in list)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (idx ==0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    target = e;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                idx--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now at the end we can apply the last step,Di2015NewLine    // actually setting the new value.Di2015NewLine    if (pi != null || steps.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pi = target.GetType().GetProperty(lastStep);Di2015NewLine        pi.SetValue(target, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19692507Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class YourService : ServiceBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private CancellationTokenSource cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine  private Task mainTask = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void OnStart(string[] args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    mainTask = new Task(Poll, cts.Token, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLine    mainTask.Start();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void OnStop()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine    mainTask.Wait();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Poll()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken cancellation = cts.Token;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan interval = TimeSpan.Zero;Di2015NewLine    while (!cancellation.WaitHandle.WaitOne(interval))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      try Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Put your code to poll here.Di2015NewLine        // Occasionally check the cancellation state.Di2015NewLine        if (cancellation.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        interval = WaitAfterSuccessInterval;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception caught)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Log the exception.Di2015NewLine        interval = WaitAfterErrorInterval;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19694235Di2015UniqueSeparatorWebClient pdfDownloader = null;Di2015NewLinestring LastFileName = ""; //To save the filename of the last created pdfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void StartPDFDownload(string URL)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    pdfDownloader = new WebClient(); //prevents that the OpenReadCompleted-Event is called multiple timesDi2015NewLine    pdfDownloader.OpenReadCompleted += DownloadPDF; //Create an event handlerDi2015NewLine    pdfDownloader.OpenReadAsync(new Uri(URL)); //Start to read the websiteDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineasync void DownloadPDF(object sender, OpenReadCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[e.Result.Length]; //Gets the byte length of the pdf fileDi2015NewLine    await e.Result.ReadAsync(buffer, 0, buffer.Length); //Waits until the rad is completed (Async doesn't block the GUI Thread)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (IsolatedStorageFile ISFile = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LastFileName = "tempPDF" + DateTime.Now.Ticks + ".pdf";Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream ISFileStream = ISFile.CreateFile(LastFileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                await ISFileStream.WriteAsync(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message + Environment.NewLine + ex.HResult,Di2015NewLine                ex.Source, MessageBoxButton.OK);Di2015NewLine            //Catch errors regarding the creation of fileDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    OpenPDFFile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate async void OpenPDFFile()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StorageFolder ISFolder = Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IStorageFile ISFile = await ISFolder.GetFileAsync(LastFileName);Di2015NewLine        await Windows.System.Launcher.LaunchFileAsync(ISFile);Di2015NewLine            //http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsphone/develop/jj206987%28v=vs.105%29.aspxDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Catch unknown errors while getting the fileDi2015NewLine        //or opening the app to display itDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19694623Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic AudioTracks GetAudioTracks(AudioTrackSearchOptions searchOptions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    AudioTracks audioTracks;Di2015NewLine    using (MidasDataContext dataContext = DataContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        audioTracks = new AudioTracks(Di2015NewLine            from audioTrack in dataContext.DbAudioTracksDi2015NewLine            join masterTrack in dataContext.DbMasterTracks on audioTrack.MasterTrackId equals masterTrack.IdDi2015NewLine            join masterTrackArtist in dataContext.DbDataLists on masterTrack.ArtistId equals masterTrackArtist.IdDi2015NewLine            orderby string.Concat(masterTrack.Title, " (", audioTrack.Mix, ") - ", masterTrackArtist.Text)Di2015NewLine            where (searchOptions.IsInactiveAudioTrackIncluded || audioTrack.IsActive)Di2015NewLine            && (searchOptions.IsDeletedAudioTrackIncluded || !audioTrack.IsDeleted)Di2015NewLine            select new AudioTrack(audioTrack.Id, masterTrack.Id, audioTrack.Isrc, masterTrack.Title, masterTrackArtist.Text, audioTrack.Mix, audioTrack.IsContentExplicit, audioTrack.IsActive, audioTrack.IsDeleted));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    audioTracks.Sort(a => a.TitleWithMix);Di2015NewLine    return audioTracks ?? new AudioTracks();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19695223Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Media.SoundPlayer(memoryStream).Play()
19695223Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void PlayBeep(UInt16 frequency, int msDuration, UInt16 volume = 16383)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var mStrm = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(mStrm);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const double TAU = 2 * Math.PI;Di2015NewLine    int formatChunkSize = 16;Di2015NewLine    int headerSize = 8;Di2015NewLine    short formatType = 1;Di2015NewLine    short tracks = 1;Di2015NewLine    int samplesPerSecond = 44100;Di2015NewLine    short bitsPerSample = 16;Di2015NewLine    short frameSize = (short)(tracks * ((bitsPerSample + 7) / 8));Di2015NewLine    int bytesPerSecond = samplesPerSecond * frameSize;Di2015NewLine    int waveSize = 4;Di2015NewLine    int samples = (int)((decimal)samplesPerSecond * msDuration / 1000);Di2015NewLine    int dataChunkSize = samples * frameSize;Di2015NewLine    int fileSize = waveSize + headerSize + formatChunkSize + headerSize + dataChunkSize;Di2015NewLine    // var encoding = new System.Text.UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(0x46464952); // = encoding.GetBytes("RIFF")Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(fileSize);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(0x45564157); // = encoding.GetBytes("WAVE")Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(0x20746D66); // = encoding.GetBytes("fmt ")Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(formatChunkSize);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(formatType);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(tracks);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(samplesPerSecond);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(bytesPerSecond);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(frameSize);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(bitsPerSample);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(0x61746164); // = encoding.GetBytes("data")Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(dataChunkSize);Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double theta = frequency * TAU / (double)samplesPerSecond;Di2015NewLine        // 'volume' is UInt16 with range 0 thru Uint16.MaxValue ( = 65 535)Di2015NewLine        // we need 'amp' to have the range of 0 thru Int16.MaxValue ( = 32 767)Di2015NewLine        double amp = volume >> 2; // so we simply set amp = volume / 2Di2015NewLine        for (int step = 0; step < samples; step++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            short s = (short)(amp * Math.Sin(theta * (double)step));Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mStrm.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    new System.Media.SoundPlayer(mStrm).Play();Di2015NewLine    writer.Close();Di2015NewLine    mStrm.Close();Di2015NewLine} // public static void PlayBeep(UInt16 frequency, int msDuration, UInt16 volume = 16383)Di2015NewLine

19697599Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ApiObject apiObject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler Initialized;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal MyClass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.apiObject = new ApiObject();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ApiStateUpdateEventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        handler = delegate(string who, int howMuch) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool cond1 = false;Di2015NewLine            bool cond2 = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(who.Equals("Something") && howMuch == 1)Di2015NewLine                cond1 = true;Di2015NewLine            else if(who.Equals("SomethingElse") && howMuch == 1)Di2015NewLine                cond2 = true;           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //wait for both conditions to be trueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( !cond1 && !cond2 )Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.apiObject.ApiStateUpdate -= handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // fire an event when both conditions are metDi2015NewLine            if (this.Initialized != null)Di2015NewLine                this.Initialized(this, new EventArgs());Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.apiObject.ApiStateUpdate += handler;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19703314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WebServiceSOAPExtension : SoapExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stream inwardStream;Di2015NewLine    private Stream return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Initialize(object initializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void ProcessMessage(System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (message.Stage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize:Di2015NewLine RewriteResponse()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string message;Di2015NewLine        var streamReader = new StreamReader(outwardStream);Di2015NewLine        var streamWriter = new StreamWriter(inwardStream);Di2015NewLine        message = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        streamWriter.Write(message);Di2015NewLine        streamWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine        inwardStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RewriteRequest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string message;Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument xmlDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        inwardStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        var streamReader = new StreamReader(inwardStream);Di2015NewLine        var streamWriter = new StreamWriter(outwardStream);Di2015NewLine        message = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        xmlDoc.LoadXml(message);Di2015NewLine        var bodyNode = xmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("Body", "http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/")[0];Di2015NewLine        var headerNode = xmlDoc.CreateElement("s", "Header", "http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/");Di2015NewLine        var actionNode = xmlDoc.CreateElement("wsa", "Action", "http://www.w3.org/2004/12/addressing");Di2015NewLine        actionNode.InnerText = "http://sampleserver.example/Action";Di2015NewLine        headerNode.AppendChild(actionNode);Di2015NewLine        bodyNode.ParentNode.InsertBefore(headerNode, bodyNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        message = xmlDoc.InnerXml;Di2015NewLine        streamWriter.Write(message);Di2015NewLine        streamWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19708572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static HttpContext FakeHttpContext(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLine    var httpRequest = new HttpRequest(string.Empty, uri.ToString(), uri.Query.TrimStart('?'));Di2015NewLine    var stringWriter = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine    var httpResponse = new HttpResponse(stringWriter);Di2015NewLine    var httpContext = new HttpContext(httpRequest, httpResponse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sessionContainer = new HttpSessionStateContainer("id", new SessionStateItemCollection(),Di2015NewLine                                            new HttpStaticObjectsCollection(), 10, true,Di2015NewLine                                            HttpCookieMode.AutoDetect,Di2015NewLine                                            SessionStateMode.InProc, false);Di2015NewLine    SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext(httpContext, sessionContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return httpContext;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19708793Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate unsafe Bitmap ApplyAlgoritmPointer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _alg._Erode(1);      //EmguCV Image.ErodeDi2015NewLine        _alg._Dilate(3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bitmap b = _alg.Bitmap;Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, _alg.Width, _alg.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte* scan0 = (byte*)bData.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < bData.Height - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j < bData.Width - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte* dataCurrent = scan0 + i * bData.Stride + j;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //White pixels onlyDi2015NewLine                if (dataCurrent[0] == 255)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte* dataLeft = scan0 + i * bData.Stride + (j - 1);Di2015NewLine                    byte* dataTopLeft = scan0 + (i - 1) * bData.Stride + (j - 1);Di2015NewLine                    byte* dataTop = scan0 + (i - 1) * bData.Stride + j;Di2015NewLine                    byte* dataTopRight = scan0 + (i - 1) * bData.Stride + (j + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //New labelDi2015NewLine                    if (dataLeft[0] == 0 && dataTopRight[0] == 0 && dataTopLeft[0] == 0 && dataTop[0] == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dataCurrent[0] = _color;Di2015NewLine                        _pixels.Add(new pixel(dataCurrent, _color));Di2015NewLine                        _color++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        byte*[] array = new byte*[4] { dataLeft, dataTopLeft, dataTop, dataTopRight };Di2015NewLine                        byte* max = array.MaxP();Di2015NewLine                        byte* min = array.MinP();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (max != min)   //Differend colorsDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            dataCurrent[0] = min[0];                                 //menim obsah adresyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (!_fromToD.ContainsKey(max[0]))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (max[0] == 255) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                _fromToD.Add(max[0], new List<byte>() { min[0] });Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (!_fromToD[max[0]].Contains(min[0]))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    _fromToD[max[0]].Add(min[0]);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            _pixels.Add(new pixel(dataCurrent, min[0]));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else if (max == min)   //Same colorDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            dataCurrent[0] = min[0];Di2015NewLine                            _pixels.Add(new pixel(dataCurrent, min[0]));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Second PassDi2015NewLine        NewList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int k = 0; k < _pixels.Count; k++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int l = 0; l < _fromTo.Count; l++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_pixels[k].color == _fromTo[l].from)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _pixels[k].pix[0] = _fromTo[l].to;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        b.UnlockBits(bData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
19708793Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void NewList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var key in _fromToD.Reverse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _fromTo.Add(new pass(key.Key, GetByteRecursive(key.Key)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte GetByteRecursive(byte p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte next = p;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_fromToD.ContainsKey(p))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            next = _fromToD[p].Last();Di2015NewLine            return GetByteRecursive(next);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return next;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class passDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public byte from;Di2015NewLine        public byte to;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public pass(byte from, byte to)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.from = from;Di2015NewLine            this.to = to;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafe class pixelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public byte* pix;Di2015NewLine        public byte color;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public pixel(byte* pixel, byte color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.pix = pixel;Di2015NewLine            this.color = color;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19709053Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace OleImageTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class OleImageUnwrapDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] GetImageBytesFromOLEField(byte[] oleFieldBytes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // adapted from http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pranab/archive/2008/07/15/removing-ole-header-from-images-stored-in-ms-access-db-as-ole-object.aspxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int MaxNumberOfBytesToSearch = 10000;Di2015NewLine            byte[] imageBytes;  // return valueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ImageSignatures = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine            // BITMAP_ID_BLOCK = "BM"Di2015NewLine            ImageSignatures.Add(new byte[] { 0x42, 0x4D });Di2015NewLine            // JPG_ID_BLOCK = "\\u00FF\\u00D8\\u00FF"Di2015NewLine            ImageSignatures.Add(new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xD8, 0xFF });Di2015NewLine            // PNG_ID_BLOCK = "\\u0089PNG\\r\\n\\u001a\\n"Di2015NewLine            ImageSignatures.Add(new byte[] { 0x89, 0x50, 0x4E, 0x47, 0x0D, 0x0A, 0x1A, 0x0A });Di2015NewLine            // GIF_ID_BLOCK = "GIF8"Di2015NewLine            ImageSignatures.Add(new byte[] { 0x47, 0x49, 0x46, 0x38 });Di2015NewLine            // TIFF_ID_BLOCK = "II*\\u0000"Di2015NewLine            ImageSignatures.Add(new byte[] { 0x49, 0x49, 0x2A, 0x00 });  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int NumberOfBytesToSearch = (oleFieldBytes.Count() < MaxNumberOfBytesToSearch ? oleFieldBytes.Count() : MaxNumberOfBytesToSearch);Di2015NewLine            var startingBytes = new byte[NumberOfBytesToSearch];Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(oleFieldBytes, startingBytes, NumberOfBytesToSearch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var positions = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (byte[] BlockSignature in ImageSignatures)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                positions = IndexOfSequence(startingBytes, BlockSignature, 0);Di2015NewLine                if (positions.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int iPos = -1;Di2015NewLine            if (positions.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                iPos = positions[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (iPos == -1)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Unable to determine header size for the OLE Object");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            imageBytes = new byte[oleFieldBytes.LongLength - iPos];Di2015NewLine            System.IO.MemoryStream ms = new System.IO.MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(oleFieldBytes, iPos, oleFieldBytes.Length - iPos);Di2015NewLine            imageBytes = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            ms.Close();Di2015NewLine            ms.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            return imageBytes;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<int> IndexOfSequence(this byte[] buffer, byte[] pattern, int startIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // ref: http://stackoverflow.com/a/332667/2144390Di2015NewLine            List<int> positions = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            int i = Array.IndexOf<byte>(buffer, pattern[0], startIndex);Di2015NewLine            while (i >= 0 && i <= buffer.Length - pattern.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] segment = new byte[pattern.Length];Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(buffer, i, segment, 0, pattern.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (segment.SequenceEqual<byte>(pattern))Di2015NewLine                    positions.Add(i);Di2015NewLine                i = Array.IndexOf<byte>(buffer, pattern[0], i + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return positions;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19710359Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace NSDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>This static class handles data serialization for the app.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>The serialization format is Microsoft's .NET binary XML, documented in [MC-NBFX] specification.</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>The efficiency could be improved further, by providing a pre-built XML dictionary.</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    internal static class SerializerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Serializers are cached here</summary>Di2015NewLine        static readonly Dictionary<Type, DataContractSerializer> s_serializers = new Dictionary<Type, DataContractSerializer>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Either get the serializer from cache, or create a new one for the type</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="tp"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static DataContractSerializer getSerializer( Type tp )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataContractSerializer res = null;Di2015NewLine            if( s_serializers.TryGetValue( tp, out res ) )Di2015NewLine                return res;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock( s_serializers )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if( s_serializers.TryGetValue( tp, out res ) )Di2015NewLine                    return res;Di2015NewLine                res = new DataContractSerializer( tp );Di2015NewLine                s_serializers.Add( tp, res );Di2015NewLine                return res;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Read deserialized object from the stream.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="stm"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static T readObject<T>( Stream stm ) where T: classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataContractSerializer ser = getSerializer( typeof( T ) );Di2015NewLine            using( var br = XmlDictionaryReader.CreateBinaryReader( stm, XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.Max ) )Di2015NewLine                return (T)ser.ReadObject( br );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Write serialized object to the stream.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="stm"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="obj"></param>Di2015NewLine        public static void writeObject<T>( Stream stm, T obj ) where T: classDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataContractSerializer ser = getSerializer( typeof( T ) );Di2015NewLine            using( XmlDictionaryWriter bw = XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateBinaryWriter( stm, null, null, false ) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ser.WriteObject( bw, obj );Di2015NewLine                bw.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            stm.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19710766Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GPGEncrypt(string src)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  FileInfo fi = new FileInfo(src);Di2015NewLine  string OutputName = GetEncryptedName(src);Di2015NewLine  if (File.Exists(OutputName))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (!chkOverwrite.Checked)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      SetStatus("Output file already exists - " + OutputName);Di2015NewLine      return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string path = fi.DirectoryName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo psi = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo(props.PGPExecutable);Di2015NewLine  psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine  psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine  psi.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine  psi.RedirectStandardInput = true;Di2015NewLine  psi.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine  psi.WorkingDirectory = Path.GetDirectoryName(props.PGPExecutable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string args = string.Format(Di2015NewLine    " --encrypt --recipient {0} --output \\"{1}\\" \\"{2}\\""Di2015NewLine    , txtEncryptID.Text.Trim() // 1Di2015NewLine    , OutputName // 2Di2015NewLine    , src // 3Di2015NewLine  );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  txtCommandLine.Text = args;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  psi.Arguments = args;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  System.Diagnostics.Process process = System.Diagnostics.Process.Start(psi);Di2015NewLine  // process.StandardInput.WriteLine(CommandLine);Di2015NewLine  // process.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLine  // process.StandardInput.Close();Di2015NewLine  process.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine  int rc = process.ExitCode;Di2015NewLine  process.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  txtCommandLine.Text = string.Format("{0} exited with return code {1},", Path.GetFileName(props.PGPExecutable), rc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return OutputName;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19712003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Subsets(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var first = source.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (first == null) return new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var others = source.Skip(1).Subsets();Di2015NewLine    return others.Concat(others.Select(s => s.Concat(new { first })));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19712003Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubsets
19712003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> SubsetsAddingUpTo(this IEnumerable<T> source, int target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This stopping condition ensures that you will not have to walk the rest of the tree when you have already hit or exceeded your target.Di2015NewLine    // It assumes that the Number values are all non-negative.Di2015NewLine    if (target < 0) return Enumerable.Empty<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var first = source.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (first == null) return Enumerable.Empty<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tail = source.Skip(1).Where(i => i.Number <= target).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var othersIncludingFirst = tail.SubsetsAddingUpTo(target - first.Number);Di2015NewLine    var othersExcludingFirst = tail.SubsetsAddingUpTo(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return othersExcludingFirst.Concat(othersIncludingFirst.Select(s => s.Concat(new { first })));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19712604Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection<byte[]>
19712604Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate BlockingCollection<string> outputQueue = new BlockingCollection<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the thread that processes informationDi2015NewLineprivate void DataProcessor()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // initializationDi2015NewLine    // process dataDi2015NewLine    while ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string foo = CreateOutputFromData();Di2015NewLine        // put it on the queueDi2015NewLine        outputQueue.Add(foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the output threadDi2015NewLineprivate void OutputThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // initialize serial portDi2015NewLine    // read data from queue until endDi2015NewLine    string text;Di2015NewLine    while (outputQueue.TryTake(out text, Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // output text to serial portDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// main threadDi2015NewLinepublic Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create the processing threadDi2015NewLine    var processingThread = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DataProcessor(), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLine    // create the output threadDi2015NewLine    var outputThread = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => OutputThread(), TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // wait for user input and processDi2015NewLine    while ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var input = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        // potentially process input before sending it outDi2015NewLine        var dataToOutput = ProcessInput(input);Di2015NewLine        // put it on the queueDi2015NewLine        outputQueue.Add(dataToOutput);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // tell processing thread to exitDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // when you're all done, mark the queue as finishedDi2015NewLine    outputQueue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // wait for the threads to exit.Di2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(outputThread, processingThread);   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19712653Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression Replace(this Expression expression,Di2015NewLine    Expression searchEx, Expression replaceEx)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new ReplaceVisitor(searchEx, replaceEx).Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19712653Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TElement, bool>> BuildFilterExpression<TElement>(Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Expression<Func<TElement, string>>, string> constraints)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Expression> expressions = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var stringType = typeof(string);Di2015NewLine    var containsMethod = stringType.GetMethod("Contains", new Type[] { stringType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TElement));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var constraint in constraints)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var equalsExpression = (Expression)Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            constraint.Key.Body.Replace(constraint.Key.Parameters[0], parameter),Di2015NewLine            containsMethod, Expression.Constant(constraint.Value, stringType));Di2015NewLine        expressions.Add(equalsExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = expressions.Aggregate((accumulate, equal) =>Di2015NewLine        Expression.And(accumulate, equal));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TElement, bool>>(body, parameter);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19712865Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<B> MapPairs<A, B>(this IEnumerable<A> sequence, Di2015NewLine                                                 Func<A, A, B> mapper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var enumerator = sequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var first = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var second = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                yield return mapper(first, second);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //What should we do with left over?Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19715155Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomLabel : Label {Di2015NewLine    public CustomLabel() {Di2015NewLine        BackColor = base.BackColor;Di2015NewLine        base.BackColor = Color.Transparent;Di2015NewLine        DoubleBuffered = true;                     Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Color backColor;Di2015NewLine    int alpha;Di2015NewLine    public new Color BackColor {Di2015NewLine        get { return Color.FromArgb(alpha, backColor); }Di2015NewLine        set { Di2015NewLine           alpha = value.A;Di2015NewLine           backColor = Color.FromArgb(value.R, value.G, value.B);Di2015NewLine           UpdateVisual(true);               Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnForeColorChanged(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnForeColorChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        if (ForeColor == Color.Transparent) {Di2015NewLine            base.BackColor = Color.Transparent;Di2015NewLine            UpdateVisual(true);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            base.BackColor = BackColor;Di2015NewLine            BackgroundImage = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Image img;        Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateVisual(bool applyChange) {     Di2015NewLine        img = new Bitmap(ClientSize.Width, ClientSize.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(img)){Di2015NewLine            g.Clear(backColor);             Di2015NewLine            g.TextRenderingHint = System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias;                Di2015NewLine            g.DrawString(Text, Font, Brushes.Black, ClientRectangle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(ClientSize.Width, ClientSize.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bm)) {Di2015NewLine            g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighSpeed;Di2015NewLine            ImageAttributes ia = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLine            List<ColorMap> cms = new List<ColorMap>();                Di2015NewLine            for (decimal f = 0; f < 1; f += 0.001M) {Di2015NewLine                ColorMap cm = new ColorMap();Di2015NewLine                cm.NewColor = Color.FromArgb((int)((1 - f) * alpha), backColor);Di2015NewLine                cm.OldColor = GetNormalBlendColor(backColor,Color.Black, f);                    Di2015NewLine                cms.Add(cm);Di2015NewLine            }              Di2015NewLine            ia.SetRemapTable(cms.ToArray());                                Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(img, new Point[] {Point.Empty, new Point(img.Width, 0), new Point(0,img.Height) }, new Rectangle() {Size = bm.Size}, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, ia);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        img.Dispose();          Di2015NewLine        img = bm;Di2015NewLine        if (applyChange) BackgroundImage = img;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Color GetNormalBlendColor(Color baseColor, Color blendColor, decimal opacity) {Di2015NewLine        int R = Math.Min((int)((1 - opacity) * baseColor.R + blendColor.R * opacity), 255);Di2015NewLine        int G = Math.Min((int)((1 - opacity) * baseColor.G + blendColor.G * opacity), 255);Di2015NewLine        int B = Math.Min((int)((1 - opacity) * baseColor.B + blendColor.B * opacity), 255);                        Di2015NewLine        return Color.FromArgb(R, G, B);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        if (ForeColor != Color.Transparent) {Di2015NewLine            using (Brush brush = new SolidBrush(BackColor)) {Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.FillRectangle(brush, ClientRectangle);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        }                        Di2015NewLine    }      Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnTextChanged(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnTextChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        if(ForeColor == Color.Transparent) UpdateVisual(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnFontChanged(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnFontChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        if(ForeColor == Color.Transparent) UpdateVisual(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnSizeChanged(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnSizeChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        if (ForeColor == Color.Transparent) UpdateVisual(true);          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19715245Di2015UniqueSeparator// XMLsDi2015NewLinestring oldXML = @"<Books>Di2015NewLine<book id='1' image='C01' name='C# in Depth'/>Di2015NewLine<book id='2' image='C02' name='ASP.NET'/>Di2015NewLine<book id='3' image='C03' name='LINQ in Action '/>Di2015NewLine<book id='4' image='C04' name='Architecting Applications'/>Di2015NewLine</Books>";Di2015NewLinestring newXML = @"<Books>Di2015NewLine<book id='1' image='C011' name='C# in Depth'/>Di2015NewLine<book id='2' image='C02' name='ASP.NET 2.0'/>Di2015NewLine<book id='3' image='XXXC03' name='XXXLINQ in Action '/>Di2015NewLine<book id='4' image='C04' name='Architecting Applications'/>Di2015NewLine<book id='5' image='C05' name='PowerShell in Action'/>Di2015NewLine</Books>";Di2015NewLine
19715245Di2015UniqueSeparator// xml documentsDi2015NewLinevar xmlOld = XDocument.Parse(oldXML);Di2015NewLinevar xmlNew = XDocument.Parse(newXML);Di2015NewLine// helper function to get the attribute value of the given element by attribute nameDi2015NewLineFunc<XElement, string, string> getAttributeValue = (xElement, name) => xElement.Attribute(name).Value;Di2015NewLine// nodes for which we are looking forDi2015NewLinevar nodeName = "book";Di2015NewLinevar sameNodes = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine// iterate over all old nodes (this will replace all existing but changed nodes)Di2015NewLinexmlOld.Descendants(nodeName).ToList().ForEach(item =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentElementId = getAttributeValue(item, "id");Di2015NewLine    // find node with the same id in the new nodes collectionDi2015NewLine    var toReplace = xmlNew.Descendants(nodeName).ToList().FirstOrDefault(n => getAttributeValue(n, "id") == currentElementId);Di2015NewLine    if (toReplace != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var aImageOldValue = getAttributeValue(item, "image");Di2015NewLine        var aImageNewValue = getAttributeValue(toReplace, "image");Di2015NewLine        var aNameOldValue = getAttributeValue(item, "name");Di2015NewLine        var aNameNewValue = getAttributeValue(toReplace, "name");Di2015NewLine        if ((aImageNewValue != aImageOldValue) || (aNameOldValue != aNameNewValue))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // replace attribute valuesDi2015NewLine            item.Attribute("image").Value = getAttributeValue(toReplace, "image");Di2015NewLine            item.Attribute("name").Value = getAttributeValue(toReplace, "name");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((aImageNewValue == aImageOldValue) && (aNameOldValue == aNameNewValue))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // remove same nodes! can't remove the node yet, because it will be seen as newDi2015NewLine            sameNodes.Add(getAttributeValue(item, "id"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine// add new nodesDi2015NewLine// id's of all old nodesDi2015NewLinevar oldNodes = xmlOld.Descendants(nodeName).Select (node => getAttributeValue(node, "id")).ToList();Di2015NewLine// id's of all new nodesDi2015NewLinevar newNodes = xmlNew.Descendants(nodeName).Select (node => getAttributeValue(node, "id")).ToList();Di2015NewLine// find new nodes that are not present in the old collectionDi2015NewLinevar nodeIdsToAdd = newNodes.Except(oldNodes);Di2015NewLine// add all new nodes to the already modified xml documentDi2015NewLineforeach (var newNodeId in nodeIdsToAdd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var newNode = xmlNew.Descendants(nodeName).FirstOrDefault(node => getAttributeValue(node, "id") == newNodeId);Di2015NewLine    if (newNode != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xmlOld.Root.Add(newNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// remove unchanged nodesDi2015NewLineforeach (var oldNodeId in sameNodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    xmlOld.Descendants(nodeName).FirstOrDefault (node => getAttributeValue(node, "id") == oldNodeId).Remove();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinexmlOld.Save(@"d:\\temp\\merged.xml");Di2015NewLine

19720218Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string OpenSSLDecrypt(string encrypted, string passphrase)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //get the key bytes (not sure if UTF8 or ASCII should be used here doesn't matter if no extended chars in passphrase)Di2015NewLine    var key = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(passphrase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //pad key out to 32 bytes (256bits) if its too shortDi2015NewLine    if (key.Length < 32)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var paddedkey = new byte[32];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(key, 0, paddedkey, 0, key.Length);Di2015NewLine        key = paddedkey;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //setup an empty ivDi2015NewLine    var iv = new byte[16];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get the encrypted data and decryptDi2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(encrypted);Di2015NewLine    return DecryptStringFromBytesAes(encryptedBytes, key, iv);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19720256Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar regex = new Regex(@"(^.*-(?=\\d+$))|(^.*-[^-]*(?=[^-]$))");Di2015NewLinemyLotsOfStringsDi2015NewLine    //for each item, create anonymous object with 2 props, the original itemDi2015NewLine    //and the Match that is returned by running the regex over the itemDi2015NewLine    .Select(item => new{item, match = regex.Match(item)})Di2015NewLine    //for each anonymous object (with properties item and match)Di2015NewLine    //filter out any items where the regex failed to match Di2015NewLine    //(e.g match.Success is not true)Di2015NewLine    .Where(x => x.match.Success)Di2015NewLine    //now create an IEnumerable<IGrouping<string,string>>Di2015NewLine    //where the value of the (successful) match is used for the key (match.value)Di2015NewLine    //and the item in the group is the item property of the anonymousDi2015NewLine    //object created aboveDi2015NewLine    .GroupBy(x => x.match.Value, x => x.item)Di2015NewLine

19726054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetupPath(string Rversion = "R-3.0.0" ){Di2015NewLine   var oldPath = System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable("PATH");Di2015NewLine   var rPath = System.Environment.Is64BitProcess ? Di2015NewLine                          string.Format(@"C:\\Program Files\\R\\{0}\\bin\\x64", Rversion) :Di2015NewLine                          string.Format(@"C:\\Program Files\\R\\{0}\\bin\\i386",Rversion);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (!Directory.Exists(rPath))Di2015NewLine       throw new DirectoryNotFoundException(Di2015NewLine         string.Format(" R.dll not found in : {0}", rPath));Di2015NewLine       var newPath = string.Format("{0}{1}{2}", rPath, Di2015NewLine                                    System.IO.Path.PathSeparator, oldPath);Di2015NewLine            System.Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("PATH", newPath);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19726246Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression<Func<T, bool>> GetSearchPredicate<T>(string parameters,Di2015NewLine                                                       Func<T, string, bool> test1,Di2015NewLine                                                       Func<T, string, bool> test2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var predicateInner = PredicateBuilder.False<T>();Di2015NewLine    var paramertsForSearch = new List<string>(parametrs.Split(' '));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    paramertsForSearch.RemoveAll(string.IsNullOrEmpty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in paramertsForSearch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var itemSearch = item;Di2015NewLine        predicateInner = predicateInner.Or(x => test1(x, itemSearch));Di2015NewLine        predicateInner = predicateInner.Or(x => test2(x, itemSearch));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return predicateInner;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar predicateSearchCustomer = Di2015NewLine    GetSearchPredicate<Customer>(search,Di2015NewLine                                 (cust, term) => cust.CustomerName.Contains(term),Di2015NewLine                                 (cust, term) => cust.CustomerFamily.Contains(term));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar predicateSearchEmployee = Di2015NewLine    GetSearchPredicate<Employee>(search,Di2015NewLine                                 (empl, term) => empl.EmployeeName.Contains(term),Di2015NewLine                                 (cust, term) => empl.EmployeeFamily.Contains(term));Di2015NewLine

19728580Di2015UniqueSeparatorMultipartFormDataStreamProvider
19728580Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MultipartFormDataMemoryStreamProvider : MultipartMemoryStreamProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Collection<bool> _isFormData = new Collection<bool>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly NameValueCollection _formData = new NameValueCollection(StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NameValueCollection FormDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _formData; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Stream GetStream(HttpContent parent, HttpContentHeaders headers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parent == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("parent");Di2015NewLine        if (headers == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("headers");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var contentDisposition = headers.ContentDisposition;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (contentDisposition != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _isFormData.Add(String.IsNullOrEmpty(contentDisposition.FileName));Di2015NewLine            return base.GetStream(parent, headers);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Did not find required 'Content-Disposition' header field in MIME multipart body part.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override async Task ExecutePostProcessingAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var index = 0; index < Contents.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsStream(index))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var formContent = Contents[index];Di2015NewLine            var contentDisposition = formContent.Headers.ContentDisposition;Di2015NewLine            var formFieldName = UnquoteToken(contentDisposition.Name) ?? string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            var formFieldValue = await formContent.ReadAsStringAsync();Di2015NewLine            FormData.Add(formFieldName, formFieldValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string UnquoteToken(string token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(token))Di2015NewLine            return token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (token.StartsWith("\\"", StringComparison.Ordinal) && token.EndsWith("\\"", StringComparison.Ordinal) && token.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine            return token.Substring(1, token.Length - 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsStream(int idx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !_isFormData[idx];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19729038Di2015UniqueSeparatorAdd1(value) {Di2015NewLine  return value + 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSub1(value) {Di2015NewLine  return value - 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSum(value1 , value2) {Di2015NewLine   if(value2 == 0) {Di2015NewLine       return value1;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   value1 = Add1(value1);Di2015NewLine   value2 = Sub1(value2);Di2015NewLine   return Sum(value1, value2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineProd(value1, value2) {Di2015NewLine    if(value2 == 0) {Di2015NewLine       return 0;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   value2 = Sub1(value2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return Sum(value1, Prod(value1, value2));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19729495Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Searches for the first file matching to searchPattern in the sepcified path.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="path">The path from where to start the search.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="searchPattern">The pattern for which files to search for.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Either the complete path including filename of the first file foundDi2015NewLine/// or string.Empty if no matching file could be found.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string FindFirstFile(string path, string searchPattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] files;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Exception could occur due to insufficient permission.Di2015NewLine        files = Directory.GetFiles(path, searchPattern, SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If matching files have been found, return the first one.Di2015NewLine    if (files.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return files[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Otherwise find all directories.Di2015NewLine        string[] directories;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Exception could occur due to insufficient permission.Di2015NewLine            directories = Directory.GetDirectories(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate through each directory and call the method recursivly.Di2015NewLine        foreach (string directory in directories)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string file = FindFirstFile(directory, searchPattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we found a file, return it (and break the recursion).Di2015NewLine            if (file != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return file;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If no file was found (neither in this directory nor in the child directories)Di2015NewLine    // simply return string.Empty.Di2015NewLine    return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19732808Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DynamicExtension<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public K ExtendWith<K>()Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        var assembly = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(new AssemblyName("Assembly"), AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        var module = assembly.DefineDynamicModule("Module");Di2015NewLine        var type = module.DefineType("Class", TypeAttributes.Public, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        type.AddInterfaceImplementation(typeof(K));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var v in typeof(K).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var field = type.DefineField("_" + v.Name.ToLower(), v.PropertyType, FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLine            var property = type.DefineProperty(v.Name, PropertyAttributes.None, v.PropertyType, new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine            var getter = type.DefineMethod("get_" + v.Name, MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.Virtual, v.PropertyType, new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine            var setter = type.DefineMethod("set_" + v.Name, MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.Virtual, null, new Type[] { v.PropertyType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var getGenerator = getter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            var setGenerator = setter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, field);Di2015NewLine            getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine            setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field);Di2015NewLine            setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            property.SetGetMethod(getter);Di2015NewLine            property.SetSetMethod(setter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            type.DefineMethodOverride(getter, v.GetGetMethod());Di2015NewLine            type.DefineMethodOverride(setter, v.GetSetMethod());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (K)Activator.CreateInstance(type.CreateType());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19733636Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> FilterByValue<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<T> obj,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, string>> propertySelector,Di2015NewLine    string propertyValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(propertyValue))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<T, string, bool>> expression =Di2015NewLine            (ex, value) => SqlFunctions.PatIndex(propertyValue.Trim(),Di2015NewLine                value.Trim()) > 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newSelector = propertySelector.Body.Replace(Di2015NewLine            propertySelector.Parameters[0],Di2015NewLine            expression.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = expression.Body.Replace(expression.Parameters[1], Di2015NewLine            newSelector);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            body, expression.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return obj.Where(lambda);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19735145Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction innerHighlight(node, pat) {Di2015NewLine    var skip = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (node.nodeType == 3) {Di2015NewLine        var matchResult = pat.exec(node.data);  // exec the regex instead of toUpperCase-ing the stringDi2015NewLine        var pos = matchResult !== null ? matchResult.index : -1;  // index is the location of where the matching text is foundDi2015NewLine        if (pos >= 0) {Di2015NewLine            var spannode = document.createElement('span');Di2015NewLine            spannode.className = 'highlight';Di2015NewLine            var middlebit = node.splitText(pos);Di2015NewLine            var endbit = middlebit.splitText(matchResult[0].length);  // matchResult[0] is the last matching characters.Di2015NewLine            var middleclone = middlebit.cloneNode(true);Di2015NewLine            spannode.appendChild(middleclone);Di2015NewLine            middlebit.parentNode.replaceChild(spannode, middlebit);Di2015NewLine            skip = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (node.nodeType == 1 && node.childNodes && !/(script|style)/i.test(node.tagName)) {Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < node.childNodes.length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            i += innerHighlight(node.childNodes[i], pat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return skip;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

19735834Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> Intersect<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> first, IEnumerable<TSource> second, IEqualityComparer<TSource> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (first == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("first");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (second == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("second");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Enumerable.IntersectIterator<TSource>(first, second, comparer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<TSource> IntersectIterator<TSource>(IEnumerable<TSource> first, IEnumerable<TSource> second, IEqualityComparer<TSource> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Set<TSource> set = new Set<TSource>(comparer);Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource current in second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        set.Add(current);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource current2 in first)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (set.Remove(current2))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return current2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19735898Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid ChangeHandler(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e ) {Di2015NewLine    switch (e.Action) {Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine            // One or more items were added to the collection.Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine            // One or more items were moved within the collection.Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine            // One or more items were removed from the collection.Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine            // One or more items were replaced in the collection.Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine            // The content of the collection changed dramatically.Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The other properties of e tell you where in the listDi2015NewLine    // the change took place, and what was affected.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid test() {Di2015NewLine    var myList = ObservableCollection<int>();Di2015NewLine    myList.CollectionChanged += ChangeHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    myList.Add(4);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19737271Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!IsPostBack)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LoadRSS();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprotected void rptRSS_ItemDataBound(object sender, RepeaterItemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.Item || e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.AlternatingItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HyperLink lnkArticle = (HyperLink)e.Item.FindControl("lnkArticle");Di2015NewLine        Label lblDescription = (Label)e.Item.FindControl("lblDescription");Di2015NewLine        Label lblRSSTitle = (Label)e.Item.FindControl("lblRSSTitle");Di2015NewLine        SyndicationItem item = (SyndicationItem)e.Item.DataItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lnkArticle.Text = item.Title.Text;Di2015NewLine        lnkArticle.NavigateUrl = item.Links[0].Uri.ToString(); ;Di2015NewLine        lblRSSTitle.Text = item.Title.Text;Di2015NewLine        lblDescription.Text = item.Summary.Text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void LoadRSS()Di2015NewLine{                Di2015NewLine    List<SyndicationItem> lstSynItem = new List<SyndicationItem>();Di2015NewLine    string uri = "http://www.weather.com/rss/national/rss_nwf_rss.xml?cm_ven=NWF&cm_cat=rss&par=NWF_rss";Di2015NewLine    SyndicationFeed myRss = SyndicationFeed.Load(XmlReader.Create(uri));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (SyndicationItem item in myRss.Items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lstSynItem.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    rptRSS.DataSource = lstSynItem;Di2015NewLine    rptRSS.DataBind();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
