19737374Di2015UniqueSeparatorWebBrowser
19737374Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoWorkAsync
19737374Di2015UniqueSeparator// by Noseratio - http://stackoverflow.com/users/1768303/noseratioDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplicationWebBrowserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Entry Point of the console appDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // download each page and dump the contentDi2015NewLine                var task = MessageLoopWorker.Run(DoWorkAsync,Di2015NewLine                    "http://www.example.com", "http://www.example.net", "http://www.example.org");Di2015NewLine                task.Wait();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("DoWorkAsync completed.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("DoWorkAsync failed: " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Press Enter to exit.");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // navigate WebBrowser to the list of urls in a loopDi2015NewLine        static async Task<object> DoWorkAsync(object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Start working.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var wb = new WebBrowser();Di2015NewLine            wb.ScriptErrorsSuppressed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (wb.Document == null && wb.ActiveXInstance == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("Unable to initialize the underlying WebBrowserActiveX");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the underlying WebBrowser ActiveX object;Di2015NewLine            // this code depends on SHDocVw.dll COM interop assembly,Di2015NewLine            // generate SHDocVw.dll: "tlbimp.exe ieframe.dll",Di2015NewLine            // and add as a reference to the projectDi2015NewLine            var wbax = (SHDocVw.WebBrowser)wb.ActiveXInstance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TaskCompletionSource<bool> loadedTcs = null;Di2015NewLine            WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventHandler documentCompletedHandler = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                loadedTcs.TrySetResult(true); // turn event into awaitable taskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TaskCompletionSource<bool> printedTcs = null;Di2015NewLine            SHDocVw.DWebBrowserEvents2_PrintTemplateTeardownEventHandler printTemplateTeardownHandler = (p) =>Di2015NewLine                printedTcs.TrySetResult(true); // turn event into awaitable taskDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // navigate to each URL in the listDi2015NewLine            foreach (var url in args)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                loadedTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine                wb.DocumentCompleted += documentCompletedHandler;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    wb.Navigate(url.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    // await for DocumentCompletedDi2015NewLine                    await loadedTcs.Task;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    wb.DocumentCompleted -= documentCompletedHandler;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // the DOM is ready, Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(url.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(wb.Document.Body.OuterHtml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // print the documentDi2015NewLine                printedTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine                wbax.PrintTemplateTeardown += printTemplateTeardownHandler;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    wb.Print();Di2015NewLine                    // await for PrintTemplateTeardown - the end of printingDi2015NewLine                    await printedTcs.Task;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    wbax.PrintTemplateTeardown -= printTemplateTeardownHandler;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(url.ToString() + " printed.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            wb.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("End working.");Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // a helper class to start the message loop and execute an asynchronous taskDi2015NewLine    public static class MessageLoopWorkerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static async Task<object> Run(Func<object[], Task<object>> worker, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var thread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EventHandler idleHandler = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                idleHandler = async (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // handle Application.Idle just onceDi2015NewLine                    Application.Idle -= idleHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // return to the message loopDi2015NewLine                    await Task.Yield();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // and continue asynchronouslyDi2015NewLine                    // propogate the result or exceptionDi2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var result = await worker(args);Di2015NewLine                        tcs.SetResult(result);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tcs.SetException(ex);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // signal to exit the message loopDi2015NewLine                    // Application.Run will exit at this pointDi2015NewLine                    Application.ExitThread();Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // handle Application.Idle just onceDi2015NewLine                // to make sure we're inside the message loopDi2015NewLine                // and SynchronizationContext has been correctly installedDi2015NewLine                Application.Idle += idleHandler;Di2015NewLine                Application.Run();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // set STA model for the new threadDi2015NewLine            thread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // start the thread and await for the taskDi2015NewLine            thread.Start();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return await tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                thread.Join();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ManagedServerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine    // IComInterface IDL definitionDi2015NewLine    [Di2015NewLine        uuid(9AD16CCE-7588-486C-BC56-F3161FF92EF2),Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // OldLibraryDi2015NewLine    public static class OldLibraryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // private COM interface IComInterfaceDi2015NewLine        [ComImport(), Guid("9AD16CCE-7588-486C-BC56-F3161FF92EF2")]Di2015NewLine        [InterfaceType(ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]Di2015NewLine        private interface IComInterfaceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            void ComMethod([In, MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Interface)] object arg);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [ComVisible(true)]Di2015NewLine        [ClassInterface(ClassInterfaceType.None)]Di2015NewLine        public class BaseClass : IComInterfaceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            void IComInterface.ComMethod(object arg)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("BaseClass.IComInterface.ComMethod");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // NewLibrary Di2015NewLine    public static class NewLibraryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // OldLibrary.IComInterface is inaccessible here,Di2015NewLine        // define a new equivalent versionDi2015NewLine        [ComImport(), Guid("9AD16CCE-7588-486C-BC56-F3161FF92EF2")]Di2015NewLine        [InterfaceType(ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]Di2015NewLine        private interface IComInterfaceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            void ComMethod([In, MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Interface)] object arg);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [ComVisible(true)]Di2015NewLine        [ClassInterface(ClassInterfaceType.None)]Di2015NewLine        public class ImprovedClass :Di2015NewLine            OldLibrary.BaseClass,Di2015NewLine            NewLibrary.IComInterface,Di2015NewLine            ICustomQueryInterface,Di2015NewLine            IDisposableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NewLibrary.IComInterface _baseIComInterface;Di2015NewLine            BaseClassComProxy _baseClassComProxy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // IComInterfaceDi2015NewLine            // we want to call BaseClass.IComInterface.ComMethod which is only accessible via COMDi2015NewLine            void IComInterface.ComMethod(object arg)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _baseIComInterface.ComMethod(arg);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("ImprovedClass.IComInterface.ComMethod");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ICustomQueryInterfaceDi2015NewLine            public CustomQueryInterfaceResult GetInterface(ref Guid iid, out IntPtr ppv)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (iid == typeof(NewLibrary.IComInterface).GUID)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // CustomQueryInterfaceMode.Ignore is to avoid infinite loop during QI.Di2015NewLine                    ppv = Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(this, typeof(NewLibrary.IComInterface), CustomQueryInterfaceMode.Ignore);Di2015NewLine                    return CustomQueryInterfaceResult.Handled;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ppv = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                return CustomQueryInterfaceResult.NotHandled;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // constructorDi2015NewLine            public ImprovedClass()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // aggregate the CCW object with the helper Inner objectDi2015NewLine                _baseClassComProxy = new BaseClassComProxy(this);Di2015NewLine                _baseIComInterface = _baseClassComProxy.GetComInterface<IComInterface>();   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ~ImprovedClass()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Dispose();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("ImprovedClass finalized.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // IDisposeDi2015NewLine            public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // we may have recicular COM references to itselfDi2015NewLine                // e.g., via _baseIComInterfaceDi2015NewLine                // make sure to release all referencesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_baseIComInterface != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Marshal.ReleaseComObject(_baseIComInterface);Di2015NewLine                    _baseIComInterface = null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_baseClassComProxy != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _baseClassComProxy.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                    _baseClassComProxy = null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // for testingDi2015NewLine            public void InvokeComMethod()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ((NewLibrary.IComInterface)this).ComMethod(null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region BaseClassComProxyDi2015NewLine        // Inner as aggregated objectDi2015NewLine        class BaseClassComProxy :Di2015NewLine            ICustomQueryInterface,Di2015NewLine            IDisposableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WeakReference _outer; // avoid circular refs between outer and inner objectDi2015NewLine            Type[] _interfaces; // the base's private COM interfaces are hereDi2015NewLine            IntPtr _unkAggregated; // aggregated proxyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public BaseClassComProxy(object outer)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _outer = new WeakReference(outer);Di2015NewLine                _interfaces = outer.GetType().BaseType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine                var unkOuter = Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject(outer);Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // CreateAggregatedObject does AddRef on this Di2015NewLine                    // se we provide IDispose for proper shutdownDi2015NewLine                    _unkAggregated = Marshal.CreateAggregatedObject(unkOuter, this); Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Marshal.Release(unkOuter);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public T GetComInterface<T>() where T : classDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // cast an outer's base interface to an equivalent outer's interfaceDi2015NewLine                return (T)Marshal.GetTypedObjectForIUnknown(_unkAggregated, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void GetComInterface<T>(out T baseInterface) where T : classDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               Console.WriteLine("BaseClassComProxy object finalized.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // IDisposeDi2015NewLine            public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_outer != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _outer = null;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ICustomQueryInterfaceDi2015NewLine            public CustomQueryInterfaceResult GetInterface(ref Guid iid, out IntPtr ppv)Di2015NewLine ifaceGuid = iid;Di2015NewLine                    var iface = _interfaces.FirstOrDefault((i) => i.GUID == ifaceGuid);Di2015NewLine                    if (iface != null && iface.IsImport)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // must be a COM interface with ComImport attributeDi2015NewLine                        var unk = Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(_outer.Target, iface, CustomQueryInterfaceMode.Ignore);Di2015NewLine                        if (unk != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ppv = unk;Di2015NewLine                            return CustomQueryInterfaceResult.Handled;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ppv = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                return CustomQueryInterfaceResult.Failed;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 19737899Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine  int v;Di2015NewLine  if(int.TryParse(textBox1.Text, out v)){Di2015NewLine    aOrder.numberOfPizzas = v;Di2015NewLine  } else aOrder.numberOfPizzas = 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19737965Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static DataSet dtProfile = null; //Database.AcquireData();Di2015NewLine    static DataTable table = dtProfile.Tables[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SendEmail()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the dictionary to hold the email data for each individual email. This allows us Di2015NewLine        // to group all of the books due for an individual together.  We will use the email addressDi2015NewLine        // as the key for the dictionary instead of CustomerID in case the user has given us twoDi2015NewLine        // different email addresses.Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, List<DataRow>> emailList = new Dictionary<string, List<DataRow>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate over the dataset and populate the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // grab the email address, will be the key for the dictionaryDi2015NewLine            string email = row["Email"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if we haven't processed a row for this email yet, initialize the entry for itDi2015NewLine            if (!emailList.ContainsKey(email))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                emailList.Add(email, new List<DataRow>());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add the datarow for the overdue book for the emailDi2015NewLine            emailList[email].Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now, craft and send an email for each unique email address in the listDi2015NewLine        foreach (string email in emailList.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // create a string builder to build up the body of the emailDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder body = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            body.Append("<html>");Di2015NewLine            body.Append("<body>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // assume the first/last name will be the same for each row, so just get theDi2015NewLine            // name information from the first row to build the opening line of the emailDi2015NewLine            DataRow firstRow = emailList[email][0];Di2015NewLine            body.AppendFormat("<p>Dear {0} {1}:  The following book(s) are due:</p>", firstRow["FName"].ToString(), firstRow["LName"].ToString());Di2015NewLine            body.Append("<ol>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // now just add a line item for each bookDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in emailList[email])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                body.AppendFormat("<li>{0}</li>", row["BookName"].ToString()); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // close up your html tagsDi2015NewLine            body.Append("</ol>");Di2015NewLine            body.Append("</body>");Di2015NewLine            body.Append("</html>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // finally, send the emailDi2015NewLine            SendHtmlFormattedEmail(email, "Overdue Books", body.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SendHtmlFormattedEmail(string recepientEmail, string subject, string body)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (MailMessage mailMessage = new MailMessage())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mailMessage.From = new MailAddress(ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["UserName"]);Di2015NewLine            mailMessage.Subject = subject;Di2015NewLine            mailMessage.Body = body;Di2015NewLine            mailMessage.IsBodyHtml = true;Di2015NewLine            mailMessage.To.Add(new MailAddress(recepientEmail));Di2015NewLine            SmtpClient smtp = new SmtpClient();Di2015NewLine            smtp.Host = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Host"];Di2015NewLine            smtp.EnableSsl = Convert.ToBoolean(ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["EnableSsl"]);Di2015NewLine            System.Net.NetworkCredential NetworkCred = new System.Net.NetworkCredential();Di2015NewLine            NetworkCred.UserName = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["UserName"];Di2015NewLine            NetworkCred.Password = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Password"];Di2015NewLine            smtp.UseDefaultCredentials = true;Di2015NewLine            smtp.Credentials = NetworkCred;Di2015NewLine            smtp.Port = int.Parse(ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Port"]);Di2015NewLine            smtp.Send(mailMessage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendEmail();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19745980Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Linq;
19745980Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte.Parse
19745980Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ParseByteArrayFromInput(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var splitInput = input.Split(','); //Splits the input into a string array. The "split" happens on the comma character.Di2015NewLine    var convertToBytes = splitInput.Select(s => //for each of these strings in the split input...Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var trim = s.Trim(); //Trim away any whitespace surrounding the number.Di2015NewLine        return byte.Parse(trim); //Parse the trimmed string into a byte.Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    return convertToBytes.ToArray();//Convert it into an array.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19746043Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] ByteArraySerialize()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream m = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(m))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.Write((int)this.Opcode);Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(this.Data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // m is really disposed hereDi2015NewLine        return m.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19746043Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (MemoryStream m = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLineusing (BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(m))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    writer.Write((int)this.Opcode);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(this.Data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    return m.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19746057Di2015UniqueSeparatorif ((expression.Member as PropertyInfo) != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the value from the PROPERTYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if ((expression.Member as FieldInfo) != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the value from the FIELDDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidMemberException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19746057Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void VisitMemberAccess(MemberExpression expression, MemberExpression left)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // To preserve Case between key/value pairs, we always want to use the LEFT side of the expression.Di2015NewLine    // therefore, if left is null, then expression is actually left. Di2015NewLine    // Doing this ensures that our `key` matches between parameter names and database fieldsDi2015NewLine    var key = left != null ? left.Member.Name : expression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the NodeType is a `Parameter`, we want to add the key as a DB Field name to our string collectionDi2015NewLine    // Otherwise, we want to add the key as a DB Parameter to our string collectionDi2015NewLine    if (expression.Expression.NodeType.ToString() == "Parameter")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _strings.Add(string.Format("[{0}]", key));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _strings.Add(string.Format("@{0}", key));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the key is being added as a DB Parameter, then we have to also add the Parameter key/value pair to the collectionDi2015NewLine        // Because we're working off of Model Objects that should only contain Properties or Fields,Di2015NewLine        // there should only be two options. PropertyInfo or FieldInfo... let's extract the VALUE accordinglyDi2015NewLine        var value = new object();Di2015NewLine        if ((expression.Member as PropertyInfo) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var exp = (MemberExpression) expression.Expression;Di2015NewLine            var constant = (ConstantExpression) exp.Expression;Di2015NewLine            var fieldInfoValue = ((FieldInfo) exp.Member).GetValue(constant.Value);Di2015NewLine            value = ((PropertyInfo) expression.Member).GetValue(fieldInfoValue, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((expression.Member as FieldInfo) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var fieldInfo = expression.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine            var constantExpression = expression.Expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine            if (fieldInfo != null & constantExpression != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = fieldInfo.GetValue(constantExpression.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidMemberException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the Parameter Key/Value pair.Di2015NewLine        Parameters.Add("@" + key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19746087Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TABLE [dbo].[ENT](Di2015NewLine    [FOO] [int] NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,Di2015NewLine    [CE4] INT,Di2015NewLine    [DOS] [numeric](3,0) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [TICOD] [char](1) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [PICOD] [numeric](8, 0) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [PINO] [numeric](8, 0) NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine    [ENT_ID] [int] NOT NULL,Di2015NewLine UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED ([DOS] ASC, [TICOD] ASC, [PICOD] ASC, [PINO] ASC, [ENT_ID] ASC)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine
19746087Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @DOS as numeric(38,37) = 1Di2015NewLineDECLARE @TICOD as varchar(1) = 'C'Di2015NewLineDECLARE @PICOD as numeric(38,37) = 3Di2015NewLineDECLARE @PINO as numeric(8,0) = 99999999Di2015NewLineDECLARE @ENT_ID as numeric(8,0) = 99999999Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT TOP 1 * Di2015NewLineFROM ENT AS ENT WITH(NOLOCK, FORCESEEK) Di2015NewLineWHEREDi2015NewLine (Di2015NewLineDOS = @DOS and TICOD = @TICOD and PICOD = @PICOD and PINO = @PINO and ENT_ID < @ENT_ID ) orDi2015NewLine( DOS = @DOS and TICOD = @TICOD and PICOD = @PICOD and PINO < @PINO ) orDi2015NewLine( DOS = @DOS and TICOD = @TICOD and PICOD < @PICOD ) orDi2015NewLine( DOS = @DOS and TICOD < @TICOD ) orDi2015NewLine( DOS< @DOS )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineorder by DOS desc,TICOD desc,PICOD desc,PINO desc,ENT_ID descDi2015NewLine

19748746Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var c = new Category();Di2015NewLine        c.Name = "Some category";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var categoryRepository = new CategoryRepository();Di2015NewLine        categoryRepository.Add(c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var a = new Article();Di2015NewLine        a.Category = c;Di2015NewLine        a.Content = "Some content";Di2015NewLine        a.Title = "Some title";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var repository = new ArticleRepository();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // give the static checker a helping handDi2015NewLine        // we don't want to proceed if a is not valid anywayDi2015NewLine        if (!a.IsValid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Hard to check statically");Di2015NewLine            // alternatively, do "Contract.Assume(a.IsValid)"Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        repository.Add(a);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CategoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool _isValid;Di2015NewLine    public bool IsValidDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _isValid; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _name;Di2015NewLine    public string Name {Di2015NewLine        get { return _name; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(value));Di2015NewLine            Contract.Ensures(IsValid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _name = value;Di2015NewLine            _isValid = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ContractInvariantMethod]Di2015NewLine    void Invariant()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(!_isValid || !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ArticleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool _isValid;Di2015NewLine    public bool IsValidDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _isValid; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _title;Di2015NewLine    public string TitleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _title; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(value));Di2015NewLine            _title = value;Di2015NewLine            CheckIsValid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _content;Di2015NewLine    public string ContentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _content; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(value));Di2015NewLine            _content = value;Di2015NewLine            CheckIsValid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Category _category;Di2015NewLine    public Category Category {Di2015NewLine        get { return _category; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value != null);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value.IsValid);Di2015NewLine            _category = value;Di2015NewLine            CheckIsValid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CheckIsValid()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_isValid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_title) &&Di2015NewLine                !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_content) &&Di2015NewLine                _category != null &&Di2015NewLine                _category.IsValid)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _isValid = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ContractInvariantMethod]Di2015NewLine    void Invariant()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(Di2015NewLine            !_isValid ||Di2015NewLine                (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_title) &&Di2015NewLine                !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_content) &&Di2015NewLine                _category != null &&Di2015NewLine                _category.IsValid));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CategoryRepositoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<Category> _categories = new List<Category>(); 19752589Di2015UniqueSeparatorcase FilterOperator.Contains:Di2015NewLine    // if collectionDi2015NewLine    if (propertyExpression.Type.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine        typeof(IEnumerable<>)Di2015NewLine            .MakeGenericType(propertyExpression.Type.GetGenericArguments())Di2015NewLine            .IsAssignableFrom(propertyExpression.Type))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // find AsQueryable methodDi2015NewLine        var toQueryable = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .Where(m => m.Name == "AsQueryable")Di2015NewLine            .Single(m => m.IsGenericMethod)Di2015NewLine            .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find Any methodDi2015NewLine        var method = typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .Where(m => m.Name == "Any")Di2015NewLine            .Single(m => m.GetParameters().Length == 2)Di2015NewLine            .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // make expressionDi2015NewLine        condition = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            null, Di2015NewLine            method,Di2015NewLine            Expression.Call(null, toQueryable, propertyExpression), Di2015NewLine            filterCriteria.ExpressionDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        condition = Expression.Call(propertyExpression, typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] { typeof(string) }), valueExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    break;Di2015NewLine

19753586Di2015UniqueSeparatorReadSize
19753586Di2015UniqueSeparatorAbstractPersistentCollection
19753586Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected virtual bool ReadSize()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!initialized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cachedSize != -1 && !HasQueuedOperations)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThrowLazyInitializationExceptionIfNotConnected();Di2015NewLine            // the below line it has to be.Di2015NewLine            CollectionEntry entry = session.PersistenceContext.GetCollectionEntry(this); Di2015NewLine            ICollectionPersister persister = entry.LoadedPersister;Di2015NewLine            if (persister.IsExtraLazy)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (HasQueuedOperations)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    session.Flush();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                cachedSize = persister.GetSize(entry.LoadedKey, session);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Read();Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19759824Di2015UniqueSeparatorOnAuthenticated = (context) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string XmlSchemaString = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rawUserObjectFromFacebookAsJson = context.User;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.Identity.AddClaim(new System.Security.Claims.Claim("urn:facebook:access_token", context.AccessToken, XmlSchemaString, "Facebook"));Di2015NewLine    foreach (var x in context.User)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var claimType = string.Format("urn:facebook:{0}", x.Key);Di2015NewLine        string claimValue = x.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        if (!context.Identity.HasClaim(claimType, claimValue))Di2015NewLine            context.Identity.AddClaim(new System.Security.Claims.Claim(claimType, claimValue, XmlSchemaString, "Facebook"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Task.FromResult(0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19759824Di2015UniqueSeparator[AllowAnonymous]Di2015NewLinepublic async Task<ActionResult> ExternalLoginCallback(string returnUrl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ClaimsIdentity identity = await AuthenticationManager.GetExternalIdentityAsync(DefaultAuthenticationTypes.ExternalCookie);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var user = new IdentityUser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Id = identity.GetUserId(),Di2015NewLine        UserName = identity.Name,Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    await LoginAsync(user, identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return RedirectToAction("Login");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return RedirectToAction("Index", "Home");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19759824Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async Task LoginAsync(IdentityUser user, ClaimsIdentity identity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    AuthenticationManager.SignOut(DefaultAuthenticationTypes.ApplicationCookie);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I can't just use the identity I got on FacebookDi2015NewLine    // I need to create this one, or else it will not signin properlyDi2015NewLine    // The authentication type has to be ApplicationCookie and the propertyDi2015NewLine    // is readonly, so...Di2015NewLine    var userIdentity = await UserManager.CreateIdentityAsync(user, DefaultAuthenticationTypes.ApplicationCookie);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we have to transfer the claims, adding a check to avoid duplicatesDi2015NewLine    foreach (var claim in identity.Claims)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!userIdentity.HasClaim(c => c.Type == claim.Type))Di2015NewLine            userIdentity.AddClaim(claim);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // then it will signin successfullyDi2015NewLine    AuthenticationManager.SignIn(new AuthenticationProperties { IsPersistent = true }, userIdentity);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19759895Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DateDiffDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    public DateDiff(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GetYears(startDate, endDate); // Get the Number of Years Difference between two datesDi2015NewLine        GetMonths(startDate.AddYears(YearsDiff), endDate); // Getting the Number of Months Difference but using the Years difference earlierDi2015NewLine        GetDays(startDate.AddYears(YearsDiff).AddMonths(MonthsDiff), endDate); // Getting the Number of Days Difference but using Years and Months difference earlierDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void GetYears(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int Years = 0;Di2015NewLine        // Traverse until start date parameter is beyond the end date parameterDi2015NewLine        while (endDate.CompareTo(startDate.AddYears(++Years))>=0) {}Di2015NewLine        YearsDiff = --Years; // Deduct the extra 1 Year and save to YearsDiff propertyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void GetMonths(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Provide your own code hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void GetDays(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Provided your own code hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int YearsDiff { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int MonthsDiff { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int DaysDiff { get; set; }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
